This study set out to examine the level of physical activity among the 3 to 6-year-olds during their time spent at play & physical exercisePlaygrounds have been identified as the place within parks where children spend the most energy.Gomti Riverfront Lucknow Kids Play Zone is helping the city in children overall develop. Concepts like winning, losing, and playing fair also develop problem-solving skills. Indoor play areas give children the opportunity to socialize with others and to develop such skills. Kids engaged in regular physical activity are healthier, both physically and emotionally.Gomti Riverfront Lucknow Kids Play Zone is one of the most beautiful parks for children in India built with international quality play equipment. All the equipment is imported from Europe. Gomti Riverfront Lucknow children park is first and one of its kind children park  in-country

Name: Nilakshi S
Title: Great walk zone.
Review: Beautiful in the early morning and during sunset. Great walk zone. Well maintained. A must visit for all.

Name: krishna292
Title: An Example of  Mismanagement after Development of a Good Riverfront garden
Review: We visited this well known new tourist attraction of Lucknow, Gomti Riverfront after checking in the hotel Garden Inn on 19th March. We had earlier visited Sabarmati Riverfront in Ahmedabad and expected this newly developed riverfront to be at least comparable with that if not better, but were very much disappointed after seeing dirty and stinking water of the river and several vendors selling snacks etc. in the garden. The garden appears to be a simple case of neglect and I feel that vendors should not be allowed in side but can be provided temporary cabins to sell items outside on the road near parking area. Of course, some vendors were seen outside also but proper management was missing. The up keep of garden is also not good and water of the river was badly stinking with lots of mosquitoes all around. It could be a good place for a morning walk (when mosquitoes might not trouble the walkers), but certainly not good for picnics or evening stroll in the Riverfront park. I was also surprised to find that people inside the park were not following Covid 19 precautions. Some checks  are necessary.

Name: Khilesh C
Title: The idea of riverfront is nice but the river is smelly
Review: River front is decently made. It has cute looking chatris. Due to the barrage downstream, there is plenty of water, but there seems to be no flow in the water. Also, there is a lot of bad odour, perhaps due to drains opening in the river. We also thought it could be the untreated water being used for irrigating the greens in the park. But any which way, the foul smell was discouraging.

Name: Ajay Kacker
Title: Beautiful place for morning walks
Review: Visited the place twice for morning walk as I was staying in a nearby hotel.Place is huge and clean as a whistle.Located in close proximity of the Ambedkar park / monument, the place is an ideal place to visit with friends and family.Jogging track is separate from the walking track. Well manicured lawns with flowers and shrubs add to the scenic beauty of the place. The river itself needs to be cleaned as it appeared to be full of water hyacinth.Will definitely come again possibly at night time on next visit.

Name: mohitrastogi
Title: Nice riverfront
Review: Gomti river flows in the middle of Lucknow. The Gomti River front is nearer to Gomti Nagar Area of Lucknow. The river front is having serene look, with a few lucknow architecture type domes to sit below. There are pathways, grasslands, benches all along the river front. There needs to more development like kids playing area, entertainment type of shows, eateries, public facilities and public transport and moreover a cleaner Gomti River.

Name: Yogesh P
Title: Great view in night light
Review: The beauty of this place was very attractive in night light. Many people came for jogging here. There was local street food available.

Name: Harsh V
Title: Chill out
Review: The place is good for hang out and chill out with friends best place in gomti nagar good view but now it has 10 rupee entry fee must visit

Name: Mr traveler
Title: Modern park
Review: Modern, Clean and well maintained technically designed park ,surrounding view is good. Nature lover must visit this place. Perfect place for morning/evening walk.

Name: rohitagarwal55
Title: Nice place to spend some quality time
Review: Visited this place in the evening with family, enjoyed the pleasant weather with some bhel puri and pop corns. A good walking track to enjoy the walk. Place was clean enough though people are habitual of littering. You can enjoy your walk with some snacks as well. A good place to hang out with family and friends. Enough parking space is also available (though it is paid).

Name: DSehgal
Title: Lovely place for a walk!
Review: It is a lovely place for a walk on a pleasant evening. Though it may not be very pleasant in extreme weather, specially summers.

Name: Ashish Gupta
Title: Nice place to spend time with friends
Review: Visited last week with friends, it was 9.30pm we were 4 friends and there was very little crowd, the park is illuminated by mild colorful lighting making it looks very nice to eyes, the flow of river gomti will calm your mind, you can spend as much time you want. It feels like time has stopped we played there took plentiful pictures and enjoyed a lot.

Name: My experiences m
Title: Mesmerizing place to hang out
Review: Mesmerizing view specially in the night and morning. Nice place to hang out with family and friends.

Name: Harsh V
Title: beautiful place
Review: this place is one of the best places in lucknow i was visit the place in new year but i suggest to visit the place in evening best place for photo shoot and for couples

Name: ASHISH V
Title: Recent build new place to visit
Review: Its recent build park in lucknow. Incase you are nature lover then you can visit this place in evening for evening walk.

Name: mehtarakeshkumar56
Title: river front
Review: a well maintained park near the gomti river . the park has an entry fee and the best time to visit the river front is in evening time , since the park is lit in the evening with wow lights . quite place to relax and enjoy the environment.

Name: Akriti G G
Title: Serene Amid Chaos!
Review: Although many areas were closed, taking a drive along the riverfront in the evening and enjoying the quite away from the chaos of the city is amazing. Beautifully built and landscaped, one wishes there was more to do in the area!

Name: rsraghavan6
Title: Good place
Review: this is the very beautiful place at evening. you can come here with your family and friends and enjoy your time. we can also have a good time to spend the rest. And also location is very best for get a chilled relax .and best to part of this place is a awesome lighting, fountains in the river and green grass parks. Best time to visit in the evening after sun set. Celebrate birthdays. A group of people singing songs over guitar and drums. Love to visit again.

Name: Shashialabur
Title: Nice place to spend some time or exercise or just relax !
Review: I had heard about this Riverfront area but I had no idea that the walkway was so long, probably a couple of kilometers !We had the time to go there only in the evening just after sunset and the whole area was very nicely lit and made for a wonderful evening walk.The pleasant surprise was that the water in the river was very clean and there was no discernible foul smell - the city administration deserves a huge amount of praise for building this beautiful riverfront area and also to keep it so clean !A perfect place for a brisk morning / evening walk or to just hang out with friends or to spend a romantic evening with your special one !

Name: 592abck
Title: Good park and clean
Review: This is a good park and well maintained. One can spend an evening here with family and loved ones. Good food.

Name: PCVerma
Title: Gomati River Bank
Review: It was not very clean place, it should be maintained properly, good efforts made to develop the river bank, appreciable and best place for evening enjoyment.

Name: Ankita S
Title: Nice progress
Review: The view and surrounding is good. The area is kept clean. Nice place for an evening recreation. Minimal nuisance. Also the progress in development of area has been good since I last visited.

Name: Hedonist_Surya
Title: Resembling the world class parks modern Lucknow.
Review: Technically designed park with all facilities availible.Gomti river front a peaceful place to relax All you need to grab a seat in front of river view.You may opt for a river ride on eve time in specially imported boats.Fantastic view with a clean pathway on the river shores.You can easily spot it in many cinematic shots and movies etc .Security , CCTV vigilance , parking is availible here.

Name: ST_INDIA
Title: Newly developed beautiful riverside place
Review: This is a Newly developed beautiful riverside place which is very well maintained. This is actually technically a park and a very peaceful area. Parking is not a problem.

Name: Pramila K
Title: Gomti Riverside Park, Lucknow
Review: Beautiful and scenic place. A must visit specially when the weather is good. Lovely view of the park and city from the bridge above.

Name: ChicLifeByte
Title: A peaceful place!
Review: Gomti river front a peaceful place. Spots to sit and see the river. Lot of greenery around which makes the whole place even more beautiful. Neat and clean walking paths around

Name: BONEMAKER
Title: Surprisingly well mointauned
Review: I had gone to Lucknow for a conference and on doing a little sightseeing I was pleasantly surprised to see the River Gomti fairly clean and lots of walking paths and the well maintained Gomti river park where lots of people visit for a pleasant river side evening (although the mosquitoes are a big menace)-Belonging to Delhi and after seeing the pathetic state of the Yamuna it was nice to see a Indian city where the river is maintained (even though there is stil lot of scope for improvement to make it on par with other world cities)

Name: akankshacoolgirl
Title: Hangout Place !!
Review: Gomti riverfront park is a new park which has been opened in the area. However, the place needs maintenance & upkeep.

Name: Pradeep Ambat
Title: A great idea with poor follow through
Review: Vis again with parents and kid on 28 Mar 18. Mosquitoes made life difficult and overall d place was dirty with littering.Still d place is good for a one time vis provided the place is cleaned and mosquito repellant Spray is carried out once in 3 days.

Name: nugu9956
Title: RIVERFRONT
Review: Gomti riverfront is big riverfront and beautiful beautification parking facilities good river is very clean

Name: Madhukar Varma
Title: Flee market of Lucknow
Review: This market has shops made of iron sheets and wood the construction is of temporary nature . T are many lanes here  the goods sold are generally used at the time of some social or religious occasion like marriage ,birth of a BABY WOMEN FLOCK IN GREAT NOS TO BUY COSMETICS . A DIFFICULT PLACE TO REACH THE RUSH IN AND AROUND IS SO MUCH THAT EVEN MOVING ON FOOT IS DIFFICULT.

Name: Shahid James
Title: No Parking & Congested
Review: kindly do not bring your own car. its typical congested market for desi shopping. like sarojini in delhi

Name: flyingwish
Title: Location of Tunday Kebabs
Review: Come here for the famous Tunday kebabs. We were not disappointed with the food. Be prepared for huge crowds of humanity as in any other part of Lucknow.

Name: Vishal K
Title: Aminabad market lucknow review
Review: Crowded place. You will get anything here.From needle to gun in nearby areas;)Do try Netram kachori.Food quality good. Ignore the Ambience and service.Prakash kulfi - If you have already tried kulfi at good outlets in mumbai or delhi, then it won't attract you much.Pricewise overrated...

Name: John Muriango
Title: Dirty
Review: Too congested! Hardly any space for walking around. Also the shop owners charge foreigners at a higher rate than locals. There is also an issue of language barrier as very few speak English, no wonder they take advantage of aliens. The worst is that people spit everywhere as they chew some substances all the time.

Name: Sahil Khan
Title: Kebabs, Shopping, Kulfi
Review: Aminabad is one of the most oldest markets of Lucknow  basically markets  of local people  & prices are very  good comparing to others markets you can also visit the famous kebab palace tundey its nearby this market

Name: JoyBose
Title: A crowded and amazing old market where you can buy everything.
Review: This is a very crowded and busy market in Lucknow. Perfect for buying all kinds of stuff at cheaper prices, from books to kitchenware to clothes and everything under the sun. Also has some decent street foodIt has different lanes or galis, each specialized for specific types of things to sell. It is also quite an old market. The buildings here are heritage buildings. So it is a great sight for people interested in history as well.

Name: Amit Gupta
Title: Aminabad
Review: Aminabad is the greatest market in Lucknow. In this market u can shop for every thing which is u want to buy.

Name: Soumyajit Saha
Title: Aminabad
Review: Aminabad is a famous market place. One thinking of shopping can visit this place and bargain to buy the items.

Name: AmRaRoRa
Title: Shopper's paradise
Review: Mohan market is a delight. We made some great buys in Lane 3. An experience in itself and something for all budgets.

Name: Nirmala B
Title: Nice bustling shopping place
Review: Very nice shopping place with very reasonably priced stuff and lots of variety and well mannered salesmen,unlike in other places where if we bargain and don’t buy they scream at us here they are very courteous and don’t say anything and Gadbadjhala is also very nice worth visiting once

Name: niya27
Title: Crowded place
Review: This is a local market in Lucknow where a person can buy almost all household goods. It remains crowded almost all the time. This place can be visited by public transport from every corner of Lucknow.

Name: David
Title: Worth Visiting
Review: This is some who wants to experience Delhi Chandini type of market, then you must visit Aminabad old market. The original Tunde Kabab resturant is located in this market as well as Net Ram for Kachori-Jalebi breakfast.

Name: chikpick
Title: The local market
Review: Better to visit with someone who knows the place. Lot of shops selling books, clothes of all types, fashion jewellery, shoes/ jutis and other stuffs. There are lanes and by lanes. Lot of shops selling chicken ke kaam ke suits, dupattas and kurtas. One can bargain also. But u must know the stuff or u might get cheated. All in all a reasonable market.

Name: Mital_Ashish
Title: Shop and Eat in Aminabad
Review: No visit to Lucknow is complete without a visit to the hustling bustling market at Aminabad. Chikan suits, chaat corners, kebab & biryani places and many many types of Mouth Freshner shops

Name: Hemant M
Title: Crammed with people
Review: Best is to get off at the kesarbagh chowk and walk since the extremely narrow and overcrowded roads are in a perpetual jam. Loads of shopping and Eating options. The delectable Tundey Kebabs and many more, all sort of chickenkari shops. But be ready to be pushed around and walk in a crowd.

Name: ShikshaC
Title: Good for shopping…
Review: I visited Aminabad during the evening on Saturday. The place is a market selling several items from clothes to utensils, sleepers, etc. at cheap rates. There are also several eateries in there.

Name: FeatureSM
Title: For shopping
Review: I used to go there to buy jewellery, footwear ,clothes , and many more things at cheaper rates.People from different part of cities come here to buy items at cheaper rate.

Name: Pravesh Goswami
Title: Shoppingg.......
Review: Old lucknow market. Lot of options of budget shopping. Be ready for tough bargains. Good variety of food available.

Name: abrahamsuji
Title: Best shopping destination
Review: Old market. Wide variety of items are available. Bargain possible. Easy access from metro. Chats & local fast food available.

Name: mohd alyaz
Title: aminabad
Review: Aminaad is great and most busy area there are many shops and restaurants, there can everything buy what u want.

Name: Reyan11
Title: Shopping centres
Review: Aminabad bazaar is famous for traders and shops. It is one of the busiest market. Items are clothes , embroidery work  , dry snacks etc

Name: Pushpendra M
Title: GREAT
Review: I want to say must visit here for history lovers. Its 18th century market. Its very interesting place for everyone.

Name: Divya
Title: My must go place
Review: I m native to lucknow ...this place is replica of delhi's chadni chowk ..if u have long shoping list u must go u will find everything there brand ..non brand ..cheapest yet good quality things ..to abolish ur hunger there are tundey kababi ..wahid biryani for non veg n for veg people u will have many reataurnts n. Strret food ...n for dessert u can have our famous prakash ki kulfi ...

Name: chucklim1
Title: 18th Century Market
Review: A very interesting & large bazaar in the heart of Lucknow. Lots of street food, restaurants, stall & shops selling gold & silver jewelry, garments, sarees....But I like the food best of all. Tried many different foods (although I dont know their names) at both road side & restaurant since it was my last day before flying home. I didnt have any stomach issues.

Name: Asim A
Title: WOW
Review: Went to Aminabad in Lucknow, it was so much fun to o some shopping there and having a great lunch.  The hustle and bustle of this place maybe too much for some people but for me it was the fun part of visiting Lucknow.

Name: Rudra Sharma
Title: Shopping bhi......crowd bhi..........
Review: Aminabad is one of the oldest and very crowded market of Lucknow. If you are fond of shopping or even not......you must visit Aminabad. The area is very close to Lucknow railway station and a very very big market.  Right from the clothes to shoes or grocery or cosmetics......you just think of it and you will find every thing in this market. We visited Lucknow for some marriage function and had to shop lot many item belonging to marriage function as well as other needs; so every one suggested us to go to Aminabad only. And believe me, we got every thing, right from the smallest item like pooja items to utensils to clothes. The only thing with Aminabad is that it is very very crowdy and conjusted  but dont get panicky with the crowd, it is same as you find in the crowford market of Mumbai or Bara Bazar/Satya narayan park area of Kolkata. One more interesting thing I observed is typical names of the shops and markets. I saw one Gadbad jhala market; which means every thing mess or wrong. But the market is very beautiful and systematic. We loved and enjoyed shopping at Aminabad. If you are planning to go to Lucknow, you must visit and shop at this market.

Name: TRAVELANE_SHANTANU
Title: Aminabad, Lucknow
Review: Aminabad is a large bazaar located in the heart of Lucknow, in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. The main product is chikan embroidered garments. The Aminabad Bazaar of Lucknow has operated since the time of the Nawabs of Awadh. Aminabad is made. Shops sell fashion products, interior decoration, bed sheets bed Covers, carpets ,ornaments, jewelry, fashion garments, fancy dresses, chikan kurta, chikan sarees and other women's wear, chikan menswear, footwear and other such apparel. Most products are locally produced. A special attraction is Thursday's footpath market.In spite of being congested at times, Aminabad is a colorful, vibrant and a lively market to shop, and you find products ranging from gold and silver to jewelry and ornaments, chikan kurtas to fancy sarees loaded with embroidery, from famous Lucknawi paan (betel leaves) to bakeries.Eateries include non-vegetarian restaurants, sweet shops, bakeries and paan shops, including Tunday Kababi,Wahid Biryani and Alamgir,Kalika Chat HouseCertain shops here are especially famous for tailoring wedding garments for brides as well as grooms within a reasonable budget. Another special feature of Aminabad is the bargaining. There is no set price here, and the rates you pay depend upon how well you can haggle. While visiting Lucknow, Aminabad is a shopping destination that can’t be missed.

Name: tickettoamoment
Title: Holi shopping 🙂👍
Review: There is lot of variety over here, you can easily get all the things which is onyour mind. Easy transport,  but there is traffic jam mostly all the time. The rush is horrible here. But it's all part of lucknow. This place is famous as old lucknow. The things are easily available but the material is not good. You can easily get medicines, books, shoes, clothes, etc. All in one place for shopping 😀😀

Name: ASHISH V
Title: Good place to visit for shopping lovers
Review: If you are planning to visit lucknow and you are the shopping lover then you can visit this place. Just one suggestion its a crowded place so take are of your belongings also when visiting here.

Name: BlrTravR
Title: Old city charm
Review: The old city centre of Lucknow, you see many heritage buildings still in their original condition. Great place for food and shopping.

Name: Niraj K
Title: For Traditional Marketing
Review: Aminabad is the most crowded Market in Lucknow. This place is good for purchasing typical Nawabi Dresses and Chiken Handicraft clothes. One of the markets in Lucknow where beside your daily needs one can purchase A to Z at very reasonable price. However if you are purchasing from footpath sellers one ought to be a big bargainer

Name: Puja_deb
Title: Good
Review: Aminabad is known for shopping and wholesale book market. Dont miss Tunday kebabi & Prakash ki kulfi if you are here.

Name: parshant
Title: Shopping Hub
Review: It is shopping Hub,very crowded place. You can purchase books, sarees and many other household products at low prices. I purchased some books and other things at low prices.

Name: lalani_13
Title: Crowded place!
Review: we just went in the car with our driver and it was so crowded that it took us some time to come out of the market.

Name: Tarun s
Title: Alinabad
Review: Aminabad market is a biggest market in Lucknow  city. And  it a oldest wholesale market in Lucknow. You can purchase all tipes of item's  in  this market.

Name: Gyanendra
Title: Shoping adda
Review: Aminabad one of the biggest shopping market in Lucknow. Everything available in this market. When I need anything  i would prefer to go this place.

Name: AshisGhatak
Title: Crowded and busy shopping place
Review: This is atypical Lucknow street hub. Chikan, Lucknow delicacy, everyday items and the streets taken together, Aminabad is a place filled hustle and bustle. One has to enjoy crowd to be here. Get a kulfi from Prakash Kulfi if you are here.

Name: clovesncinnamon
Title: Good place for shopping
Review: Take your time and explore these shops for Chikankari work. Have kulfi and shop for clothes and jewellery

Name: iammaxwanderer
Title: Giant Shopping market area.
Review: Aminabad well if you are a lucknowi people you would surely know about it well let me demonstrate it briefly.The heavily crowded marketplace with the availability of each and everything from Electronic gadgets to Hand-made artpieces not yet From stationary items to all classical books and clothing ,jewellery , food , auto parts etc.This place is known for wide range of availability of books and clothing at a hot-deal price.Basically its been said here that the price offered at this place of any item is cheapest in whole lucknow..Basically its been designed such a way that when you'd feel tired after shopping there is jhandewala park amidst the market to have a rest or relax for a while and the park too offers an Underground parking for vehicle there.Generally you need to be a bit careful at the site because of some pocketpicking news are often reported here.

Name: Jai1976
Title: A good place for marketing
Review: A very economical buying place for the famous Chikan work. Do visit 2-4 shops before making your mind.You need to park your veh away from the market as it is very difficult to negotiate the traffic.

Name: Bobby J
Title: Nice to visit
Review: It has a wide variety of products ranging from trinkets to apparels to jewellery, cosmetics, footwear.. etc Besides, it has umpteen eateries and food stalls serving sumptuous food and sweetmeats.

Name: Ram S
Title: Nice place in Lucknow.
Review: When you come here you can see such a great place in Lucknow. We really enjoy lots and recommend when you in Lucknow must to visit such a lovely place.

Name: amitverma091
Title: Mall for everyone
Review: Aminabad is best place for those who love shopping. Here you find everything you need in the best price but you should know the bargaining.

Name: Amit M
Title: Shop & Eat
Review: Aminabad is heart of Lucknow and is the best place for shop and eat. Everything is available in a single market. Shop for dresses, shoes, old books, electronics, electrical items. Everything is available there.Then enjoy Kawabs, Parathas, Kulfi, Chaat, Paanipuri, Biscuits, Namkeen etc any thing of choice.I had gone for Tundey Kawab first followed by Prakash Kulfi.I visited the place around 8pm in the night and especially gone for eating Kawabs.

Name: Syed K
Title: Shooping paradise
Review: If you are coming to Lucknow, your focus should be on 2 things - Shopping and eating. Chowk and Nakkhas is famous for its eateries and Aminabad for its must try chicken work. You will find so many varieties in such a low price that you will be confused which one to take and which one to leave

Name: Mahesh Kulkarni
Title: Aminabad
Review: The Heart of Old Lucknowi Tahajib and foodie heavan.Nestled  around areWahid BiryaniAl Aziz KababTunday kababPrakash ki Mashoor KulfiDayal KulfiAll old food houses morr than 30 to 50 years old.Mouth watering delicacies are prepared and served still in old golden style of eateries.Big pots lined on roadside out of the hotel to attract the food pilgrims for kababs and kulfi.Old cycle rikshaw pullers dot the roadside line.Khairati hotels are also among the crowded streets on both side of this narrow gallies in Aminabad.Must visit location in Lucknow to experience the Old n Golden era of City of Nawaab - Lucknow.Even the rates are very moderate and medium in nature.

Name: Teeny Weeny Bitess
Title: Eat, shop and repeat.!
Review: Being a Lucknowite I know this place since my childhood. Doesn’t matter what you want just come here. It’s a flea market, open nearby 11 AM. You can shop for books, second hand books, clothes, footwear and yes there are lots of option to eat from. Whether you are vegetarian or not you will find many things to munch on. Prakash kulfi is also here, which is a must try along with many roadside chicken delicacies.

Name: Rohit T
Title: Shopping and Shopping
Review: Its much better than Chandni Chowk of Delhi. Shop for the whole day from pin to piano and then enjoy Tunday kebab or Prakash Kulfi or chaat or simple Indian and Chinese food at Madhur Milan

Name: ForeverRover
Title: OK place
Review: This is the old part of Lucknow and super crowded even on sundays. I could not love the place so much as not used to this much crowd. There are a few good eateries and some good shops for chikenkari.

Name: Hedonist_Surya
Title: Famous for its market and few attractions.
Review: Very crowdy & suffocating place."Crowdy" for a reason that it has narrow roads and a very vast market with cheap and reasonable price you could barely find a way to step in unless you push off the crowd.prefer to come here by public transport.Market is basically 3-4 section(1-Clothing   2-Stationary   3-Electronics   4-Food).

Name: ST_INDIA
Title: Old Lucknow
Review: This is a old Lucknow place which is famous for chicken clothes, book market, souvenir, old local food joints. Just imagine chandni chowk of Delhi.

Name: Sapna A
Title: Tundey kababi
Review: Went to this first outlet that was opened way back in 1905. Very difficult to reach as roads are congested but worth going. The stuff is awesome and it is very economically priced

Name: randhirt2017
Title: Best shopping place for all class families
Review: You will find almost everything is this market,i bought artificial jewellery in gadbadjhala there ar so many varieties for everything.you can shopping in marriage

Name: himanshulko
Title: Shopping Place
Review: Best shopping place in lucknow. U will get every thing regarding daily day to day life. From toe to head u will get in this shopping place. Variety is main.

Name: Raaz_Still_Raaz
Title: One of the old market in India
Review: One who is visiting Lucknow should visit this market. As it is very crowded in the evening so better not to go by car use public transport. This place has buildings from ancient. Good for street shopping as well as having branded shops.

Name: Niya1315
Title: Crowded Market
Review: You will find almost everything in this crowded market. I visited this place on Saturday evening. It was very difficult to even walk at that time. I bought chicken suit in one of the shops at the reasonable price. A lot of eateries were also there.

Name: Deblina B
Title: Lucknow Shopping-Chikan kari, kulfi
Review: Go for street shopping to get famous chikan karis in resonable price .Have kulfi to add more to your experience.

Name: Ravindra R
Title: Bustling market
Review: Old Lucknow, bursting at its seams. Favourite with many locals to buy authentic chikan kurtas for men and women. Narrow lanes, hundreds of shops selling reasonably priced stuff, some great local eateries including moghlai fare and chat but poor parking space sums up Aminabad.

Name: Shivbalak
Title: Aminabad
Review: Aminabad is an old market in lucknow famous for non-veg food like TUNDAY KABABI, WAHID BIRYANI, KULFI etc. It was a busy market selling clothes on road side.Railway station and Bus station is nearby distance.You can find a cheap accessories here.

Name: Manish Pande
Title: the hustling bustling part of Lucknow
Review: A very busy and crowded part of Lucknow.. but offers a wide range of veg & non veg food and snacks.. there is a books' market too.. has an underground vehicles'  parking which is multi-level to accommodate more than 100 cars at a time.. lip smacking chaat and kulfis sold in specialized outlets

Name: Apurva S
Title: Shop n shop
Review: One of the the oldest shopping market in lucknow is aminabad. All day you can shop eat &, repeat. If you want to shop ethnic wear and chicken-kaari cloth this place is for you. Form street shop to biggest showroom, you can get every possible things here. But shopping not so easy for you. You have to know bargaining trick, they are always told you double tripple price of the product. But some shop's have fix price also. Aminabad is very old and conjusted area. You can't take there car. *Important note:- be aware from thief in this market you can not guess when your valuable things get stolen. So keep you eyes are open and shop wisely.Enjoy Shopping😊

Name: shuchivratmishra
Title: Nice and cheap market place.
Review: Aminabad the old Lucknow is the biggest and cheapest market in Lucknow. One can get anything in this market at the cheaper price. There are thousands of shops. But traffic is very poor.

Name: knightrider02
Title: Market place for chicken kurtas
Review: It's a big market place for chicken kurtas. And while shopping if you get hungry then there are lot of hotels available.It's crowded market place bad idea to go by car. If you hire a cab then leave the can before market starts. Nice quality chicken kurtas you can get here.In Lucknow it is famous saying, yaha chicken khaya bhi jata hai aur pehna bhi jata hai...

Name: Narendra S
Title: shopping for chickan work
Review: its a very crowded place and you will find yourself lost in the crowd. cars cannot move around. bargaining for dresses is allowed, but be careful, you might as well bounce into a cow.

Name: Dalbir_S_Virdi
Title: The Old City but OLD is GOLD
Review: Best time to visit Aminabad is post Sunset or even late in the evening when most shops are closed and you can easily get a parking place. Aminabad is the place where you will find famous Tundai Kebabs "Pride of Lucknow", traditional nonv eg preparations of Lucknow, best of the Paans and Desserts.

Name: anuj729
Title: One medicine for all the diseases............
Review: Aminabad......one of the oldest, busiest and biggest marketplace in Lucknow.What's Good........you get all kinds of stuff needed in day to day basis.1) A big jewellery and cloth market near ganeshganj and jhandewala park.2) Wholesale cloth market.....Pratap market, Mohan market and Nazirabad famous for lucknawi chikan handicrafts.3) Mumtaz market for stationary and household items.4) Medicine market for medical equipments and medicines.5) latouche road for engineering tools and iron products.6) Hanuman Mandir lane for kids bicycles.7) Sri ram road for oil and Sweets shop as well as local eateries.8) Garbad jhala famous for artificial jewellery and cosmetics.Conclusion........a very busy market place, next to impossible on a private vehicle.No proper loo for ladies lacks basic amenities. Always jam packed with vehicles and sea of people.Better to visit in the morning or afternoon when it's not rushy.

Name: krishna831
Title: good
Review: good place for shopping and enjoying. you get there are many products on very less price.this market is full from people everytime

Name: Rasheedur Rahman Shihab
Title: Delicious Food Hub
Review: Aminabad is the life for all non veg food lovers. It attracts all visitors of the city. Delicious Kababs are its speciality.

Name: Sarvesh P
Title: Aminabad
Review: Aminabad in locktwd Lucknow India there building was very beautiful this made my people this was very amazing

Name: Daniel
Title: Amazing Vibe, do not miss visiting this place.
Review: This is a huge area, a market of sorts with a major share of shops being street side shops. I found many things which were of decent quality but of amazing value for money price.1. I bought a kilo of walnuts for Rs. 500 (I was quote Rs. 850)2. My wife bought some fancy blouses for Rs. 250 each which she swears would cost Rs. 1500 at any showroom.3. She also bought sandals for Rs. 150 and slips for Rs. 2504. 4x heavy bangles for Rs. 80And the list goes on. Some tips for shopping in Aminabad market.1. Plan to visit at around 13:00. Grab lunch at Tunday Kababi or similar and start the shopping.2. Make sure you carry a small backpack so that you can dump all the small items into it which makes carrying easy.3. Prakash Kulfi is a must. If you are lucky you will find some carts selling Makhan Malai.4. Bargain hard, you will know when someone will not reduce the price further but do you best as you can never be sure.5. It is best to buy items such as sarees, dress etc which need a thorough inspection during the day. Make sure you check for damages spots tears etc. We almost bought two sarees only to realize just before we paid that there were many spots.6. Market starts winding up at around 20:00 but some stalls will remain till 21:007. On your way from Naka towards the market, you will find some sweet shops which are awesome and very easy on the pocket if you wish to carry sweets back home.Hope this helps.

Name: Yashu94
Title: Aminabad market is a smaller version of Hazratganj market
Review: It is a lovely place to shop around. Kurtas at 150 bucks, earrings at 50 and good food! Be smart enough not to get cheated.

Name: sanjivsony
Title: Old Test Still maintain
Review: In this market we eat Kabab at Tandoi Kabab and Prakash Kulfi. Its good test. Street market is available for shopping.

Name: Meenakshi S
Title: Best Shopping in Lucknow
Review: If you are looking for authentic chikankari work at reasonable prices, then this is the place to be. Best to go during day time and if possible with a local or atleast get a shop recommended by a local. Tons of choices and bargain a lot!

Name: HOMPRS
Title: Chaotic
Review: Aminabad market is one of the main market for chickan karigari shopping. And for non veg lovers, its Tundey kebabi at aminabad. Must try: Galauti kebab (mutton), wahid biryani (chicken) from adjacent shop, chickan work in the market (Bargain). No fixed rate shops.

Name: Pradyumna M
Title: All things easily available at great price
Review: Whenever i think of some books or any other accessories at cheap price i only remember a place called aminabad of lucknow which includes all great things and also have different variations in products but its really really crowded with lot of people.

Name: Peeyush Agarwal
Title: Huge and crowded...
Review: The place is spread out over a big area and you can shop to your heart's content but the place can get extremely crowded with hardly any space to walk

Name: PD1059
Title: great shopping place for economy buyers
Review: It is a great place to purchase anything that you can think of. It may clothes, crockery, food items, readymades, clothes for marriage, gold ornaments etcccccccccccccc

Name: #Travel Freak
Title: Best shopping place and good food
Review: Aminabad.. Place for a good shopper and good eater...😄From roadside thela to branded showrooms with varieties of clothes.. From ethenic to western.. U can buy all here..Regarding food Pankaj Kulfi se famous.. There is Tundey kebab, wasim biryani for nonveg lovers.. For vegeterian there is resturant Madhur Milan, completely veg with different food sections..For artificial and kundan jwellery here is best place named Gadbad jhala.. With fine bangles and jwellery.. Jwelleries are also available for rent..

Name: ashwanis24
Title: Awsome
Review: I visited here for shopping purpose of clothes for marriage...the cloth collection was quite impressive..the most attractive thing was having a wide range of clothes of good quality at very low price

Name: ujuntold
Title: Shopping 🛒
Review: The place is really crowded with a variety of items to buy for men as well women for wedding 👰 as well as any occasion

Name: UTKARSH PRATAP S
Title: Busy but good
Review: The aminabad market is one of the most busy places in the entire city probably the busiest one as it the first choice of people for shopping.

Name: Rajani B
Title: Best embroidery pieces
Review: This is a famous cloth market of Lucknow. You get quality chikan embroidered clothes here. This is an old market and has preserved this handicraft talent of people of Lucknow for long. Embroidery is usually done on silk and muslin clothes. This is a fashion place and designs are both modern and traditional.

Name: Abhishek S
Title: Central Market
Review: This is Famous market centrally located so easily accessible. Famous for its Lucknawai Chicken Dresses and street food.

Name: ChiefExplorers
Title: Essence of Old City
Review: Aminabad is in true sense shows you the older part of lucknow. There are so many activities which take place all around this part of Lucknow, that makes it a very fascinating space to visit.

Name: durex p
Title: Good market place
Review: This is famous for cheap cloths .items and other product ..but this is very crowded market so many theives are there in market..so if u go plz keep our luxury item in safe place

Name: MSircar
Title: If its Lucknow Chikan Work you are after, this is the place!
Review: Aminadad is 'the' destination for Lucknow chikan work. I would certainly recommend Krishna - a store which keeps all the latest in Chikan hadnwork. Post shopping, stop by Prakash Kulfi (very close to Krishna in Aminabad), a 60+ yr old establishment to satisfy your sweet cravings.

Name: YatriForever
Title: Crowded , noisy local market.
Review: Braving the crowd is not easy here. The hygiene level of the street food is questionable. The noise of those 3 wheeler could be annoying.  Unless there's a specific reason to be here, I wouldn't recommend this place to any first time  visitor to Lucknow. Not certainly a tourist attraction.

Name: Prakash K
Title: Best place in lucknow
Review: Aminabad is a famous place in lucknow for street shopping You can enjoy delicious food here..You can find the famous tunday kababi here.

Name: Dryogendranath M
Title: VISIT TO AMINABAD, LUCKNOW.
Review: This is the old Market place situated in the heart of the city. Temple of Lord Hanuman is quite famous and shops of almost all the commodities and all ranges are available in the market.

Name: ILIKA
Title: OLD LUCKNOW
Review: This area is famous for tunday Kababs. It is a very crowded area with a local market. Be aware of pickpocketers.

Name: 268yusufn
Title: ALWAYS CROWED
Review: Aminabad is always crowed people . A place which is very famous for one more thing that is your thing will be stolen .So need to be careful about your thing everyone.

Name: Vibhu S
Title: Aminabad
Review: this is various of window shopping with cheapest type of cloth ,artificial ,books, collection of wedding.Aminabad is main shopping place in Lucknow

Name: ansh280810
Title: shopping
Review: cheap and best market for shopping of everything. it is nearest market to charbagh railway station. Gadha Bhandar, gita vastralay, rama book depo famous shops.

Name: Sonia B
Title: Absolutely crazy
Review: This is one of the craziest places I have ever been to. It's hard enough to get there - so crowded it is at all times. We left our car at a distance and walked to the market. It took us a good 10 minutes to cross the road and enter the shopping area, which is a sea of shops, stalls, and people. It's easy to get lost. There isn't anything you cannot find here. You may have to bargain, but most things are pretty cheap or reasonably priced. Take care of your belongings while you are there.

Name: Chaitanya A
Title: Aminabad Lucknow
Review: This is one of the oldest and busiest market in the city.One can get everything here starting from a small pin to large house hold things.Heavy rush can be seen during day hours and evening.

Name: Mrinal Gautam
Title: Shopper's paradise
Review: One has to visit this place to experience the buzz of this market and feel the pulse of lucknow, you can find any & everything in this market, this is market which can be said the supply chain of lucknow most restaurants & cafes.....

Name: rockzzM77
Title: A famous market in Lucknow
Review: Aminabad a famous market in Lucknow, here you found valuable fashion products, and also this place is hub of book shops.

Name: MariaK638ET
Title: Great Shopping Trip
Review: Aminabad is the most popular shopping area of Lucknow. For traditional clothing and items like bangles and costume jewellery, it's hard to beat. It has winding, twisting alleyways and shops within shops. It's really exciting to shop there. But there's only one problem. To get the best out of this traditional shopping area of Lucknow, you have to have good, old-fashioned haggling skills. And I don't! But....my friend and adopted sister-in-law Babita does. So when Aine,a friend from my native Ireland, was here recently, we called up Babita and beseeched her to help us out. She brought us on an incredible journey. Thanks to her, I got several armfuls of lovely bangles. My Aine did too. She also picked up some nice ethnic items, i.e, shawls and the like, for friends back in Ireland. Again, thanks to Babita. Like I said, Aminabad is great for a visit. But there are a few things you have to sort out before you go. Firstly, you should decide what you need to buy before you go there. Secondly, you should bring someone with you who knows how to bargain. Satisfaction guaranteed!

Name: arvindkanchan
Title: Heart of Lucknow
Review: Aminabad is basically a crowded market place. All the varieties of dresses, books, medicines, jewellary, food ingredients, dry fruits, household items etc..etc..everything is available here.Tunday kababi the famous non-veg restaurant is also a big crowd puller. Obviously parking is a big problem.

Name: Rohit B
Title: A very holy dip!
Review: It is believed that a dip in Chakra Tirtha at Naimisharanya is equivalent to doing all the religious sites in the country. The water is clean and temperature is mildly warm, thus it is very convenient to take a holy dip.

Name: Tanvi
Title: Nice
Review: It is believed Lot Vishnu's chakra fell in this river . It is nice one most visit here if they are in Lucknow .

Name: Ajay T
Title: Excellent history
Review: Very relaxing place, this temple having very old history. People are believed that Lord Vishnu's Chakra was fallen at this place that is why place is called Chakra tirth temple. But there are so many other temple must watch them. We really enjoyed the trip.

Name: Pushpendra M
Title: NICE
Review: I always love to visit temple. Its really great experience here. Very Peaceful place for everyone. Must visit here.

Name: contact2vishal
Title: Holy Place to visit
Review: This is ancient forest mentioned in the Mahabharata and the puranas. It lay on the banks of the Gomti RiverNamisharnya (Nimasar) is mentioned in Hindu mythology associated with Lord Brahma, Lord Vishnu, Devi Sati and Lord Shiva. This place is unique due to the belief that there are 33 Hindu Goddesses of Goddesses. It is considered to be the most sacred of all the pilgrim center of the Hindus. It is said that if someone performs penance for 12 years on this ground then it goes to Brahmalok. This place is located in Sitapur district, 94 km from Lucknow on the banks of river Gomti. This place is mentioned in the form of a dense forest in many ancient texts, including the Mahabharata. To see the various temples here, one day's journey is definitely worthwhile.

Name: Vipin Arora
Title: Nice place
Review: Naimisharanya is known to be a sacred place for Hindus as nearly 80000 sages did their penance here and worshipped the supreme lord . Chaktateerth is considered to be holy waters and a dip is recommended. There are some small temples around the campus . The only trouble is pandits trying to get money from you by getting sankalpa from you . Though it's not that they ask you hundreds of rupees , even 10 rupees is okay but the pestering is a bit irritating .

Name: Rohit T
Title: Sacred for Hindus
Review: Around 90 km from Lucknow, you have to to drive down from Lucknow to Sitapur Road. After 50 km at Sidhauli, take a left tun, continue for 35 km till you reach Kalli Crossing. Then 10 km from there and you reach Neemsaar. Visit this holy place for about an hour and then you can go to nearby Lalita Devi temple and Vyaas Gaddi

Name: Karthik R
Title: Religiously important place
Review: Chakra Thirth - For the need of sages, Lord Brahma sent his Chakra - Manomaya Chakra to identify a spot for them to meditate. The Chakra settled at a deserted place and addressed the Saints that, this place by the banks of river Gomati. It is believed that there is no other holy place, as this one in this entire universe. Chakra-Theertha is said to be the center of the universe. It is said that the large sweet-water spring that marks the location of Chakra-Theertha has no bottom. It is said that by taking bath in Chakra Theertha, sins of 10 earlier generations and 10 future generations will also vanish. We did not take bath here and moved on with the prokshanam of the water.

Name: Gohel D
Title: Doesn't show correct location by ur app
Review: Doesn't show correct location through ur app. Please rectify. We were planed to visit this place and went today by uber as per shown  ur app but ur app and uber app both doesn't not show correct location of this place. I request u please correct this errors because save time of travellers.

Name: Ramaswami V
Title: Naimisaranyam visit
Review: We went to Naimisaranyam, one of the 108 divyadesams of Sri Vishnu and visited important places there, including the South Indian vishnu temple and Ahobila Mutt.   It was a Saturday and the place was very busy with people and activities.  Lots of religious history shared by pundits.  Great place to visit

Name: Jaspal_Singh
Title: Wonderful Place
Review: Very nice and unique place, where one do parikarma doing the dip. Conveniences around to change and do religious chores. Be careful of self solicting religious people as they can fleece you  in the name of your pitra/punya karma/bla bla..Nevertheless great place to sit/meditate/move around and take holy dip.

Name: KRAMA200
Title: Sacred Dip
Review: Chakra Thirth is situated about Eighty Kms from Lucknow in Sitapur Lucknow Highway.It is believed that Chakra Tirth was the place where the 'Chakra' of the Hindu god Brahma stopped and went inside the earth, declaring that particular spot to be holy.  and epicenter of UniverseAnother version of the myth associates the place with the 'Sudershan Chakra' of the popular Hindu god Vishnu. Many devotees visit this place to have a holy dip in the cChakra Teertha to ward off your sins. One of the must visit places for Vaishnavas

Name: Gurumurthy Bhargava
Title: Pilgrimage......continues
Review: Chakra tirth  is located about 90 kms from Lucknow off Sitapur Lucknow highway.This place is revered as the holiest place to wash all sins by having a customary dip.There are many teertham (Holy water bodies) in India but this place has its own significance.The circular tank has two concentric circles the central circle is forbidden for bathing.As per custom one has to donate gold or silver item in the central pond as written on the perimetry  wall.  The day I Visited  was close to Dusshera hence was crowded.Only if the management takes  a lesson from TTD this place can be outstanding.Another thing which the management can improve is free this place from the priests who are busy fleecing gullible pilgrims which at times is annoying . However, must for devoted Hindus.

Name: Ramana G
Title: Sacred Place
Review: Visited Chakra Tirth Temple for  a short duration for its significance in our mythology. Easily accessible from Lucknow (2 hours drive). Performed pooja at Shiva temple after taking holy dip in chakra tirth

Name: Vibhu S
Title: Chakra Tirth Temple
Review: This is place of Chakra Tirth Temple near a neem Saar in Sitapur place and this holy place and around water flow

Name: Srinivas K
Title: Salvation
Review: A place filled with pilgrim spots. There is a definite need to avoid the half baked pandits. A reading of the Mahabharata and Ramayana before visiting will do a world of good. The water in Chakra Teerth is refreshing. Though new moon day and full moon day are considered auspicious for a visit would suggest any other day for a refreshing visit. Needs a lot of upgradation.

Name: vinitasaraf2015
Title: Holy Pool
Review: It is said a dip in the holy pool is very beneficial. Lots of small temples located here. Overall very peaceful and calming

Name: qahead123
Title: Aastha ki dubki
Review: Aastha ki dubki is a must at this place. This is the holiest place on earth for hindues. Also th eplace has a shaktipheet nearby, so a must go .

Name: DhirajJurno
Title: One of the most revered pilgrimage place of UP
Review: Located in Sitapur district of UP, Nemisharan is a holy place a visited by thousand of devotees everyday.  Nemisharan mela and fair is also very famous among the people of UP. its pond hold holy significance people come here to take a holy dip into it with their family

Name: ansangam
Title: Chakra Tirth Temple, a place of activities
Review: At Chakrathirth there is a round shaped holy water pond where you will find People taking  bath  and worshiping . The pond  is surrounded by some age old  temples.   It is believed that Chakra threw by Brahma , went inside the earth at this place creating a  large water source developed at this place .Godess Lalita Devi  regulated the flow of water to establish the  Chakratirth .  Number of people visit this holy place, particularly on Somvati Amavasya.

Name: vikashvikki92
Title: much beautiful spot
Review: I visited this Place with my friends in the 2nd of October 2016.  It is in Out Of Lucknow, Its at Nemisharan in Sitapur. Really we are Enjoying very much this place. - Vikas TrivediLaxmanpur, Trivediganj (B.B.K)

Name: Saurabh M
Title: It is devotional place of hindu
Review: it is in outer lucknow and that place known as bakshi ka taalab.it is a peaceful place and filled with crowed while hindu festivals

Name: Vijaypsingh81
Title: Nice Temple
Review: I visited this Temple with my family in the beginning of October 2016, The overall ambience of the Temple is good, and has great religious values

Name: Dharmendra S
Title: Nice Place containing history of ancient time of India
Review: This is one of the holiest place for Hindus as it is famous for chakra teerth. Its at Nemisharan in District Sitapur. Around 80 KM from Lucknow. Nice place. I visited this place many times as this is only 10 KM from my village. Must see lot of temples at this place. Rishi Dadhichi was from this place.

Name: Manish B
Title: Divine
Review: Ancient temple and very important pilgrim place of hindus. The place is said to very old and very important. Many people visit the temple daily. Must visit place and worship.

Name: abhayverma2007
Title: Holy place
Review: I recently visited this place. Its a temple along with holy chakra. People says that this chakra is rotating but the fact is that the water inside the chakra is rotating because people are moving inside the water.

Name: Abhishek S
Title: I belong to SITAPUR, I have visited many times to Naimish, Its really a great place for devotion
Review: I belong to SITAPUR, I have visited many times to Naimish, Its really a great place for devotion I belong to SITAPUR, I have visited many times to Naimish, Its really a great place for devotion I belong to SITAPUR, I have visited many times to Naimish, Its really a great place for devotion

Name: Sachin G
Title: Must Visit - Ancient Place
Review: This is a place which is written in Vedas, Vyas Gaddi is also there and Lalita Mata Temple is one of the oldest temple in India.. With River Gomti and peaceful atmoshpere one can enjoy mindset peace...

Name: travellerasr1407
Title: Serenity at its best
Review: Very serene environment here, and beautifully made temple, visited here with family and spent couple of hours in Peace and with God

Name: Shri Krishan Kansal
Title: Satnarain Katha Origion
Review: A place in Hindu religion where Sukji bhagwan preached this katha to 84000 rishis for the first time on the request of Maharishi Vedvyash and a place where Barhmaji visited earth and a water kund originated the depth of which is unknown and out of bound for everyone. The place needs to be maintained properly and administration should develop it as a religious tourism place.

Name: pazhani
Title: Good pilgrimage place
Review: Good pilgrimage place to enthrall the good oldies tradition. Though pundits are money minded, it is our interest to keep them or leave.

Name: SjAwadh
Title: An ancient holy place !!
Review: 1. This place is almost an hour drive from Lucknow and located in district Sitapur.2. The distance is around 85 km and it is on road leading to left at N.H.24 at a place called Sidhauli on Lucknow- Delhi Highway.3. The place got mentions in ancient Hindu scriptures and is believed that Lord Brahma himself identified this place for sages to perform meditation and prayers in unabated way.4.The Chakra Tirth temple is established at that very place where wheel or Chakra of Lord Brahma stopped in search of ideal area.5. Here a holy pond or Chakra Tirth came into existence and depth of this pond is considered unfathomable and crossing of the inner circle is not allowed.6. Devotees come here to take dip in holy waters and to get rid of sins and after that worship in surrounding temples .7. The problem here is the presence of too many local priests who are not ready to spare anyone and think that only they can show way to please God.8.The maintenance of place is not good and as the place has so much religious significance this needs more attention.9. There are more temples near this place which should be visited like temple of Goddess Lalita Devi which is one of Shakti peeth  and other one is Hanuman temple where it is believed brother of Ravan named Ahiravan kept Ram and Laxman in captivity and Hanumanji freed them .10. Neemsar or Naimisharnya is a sacred place in Hindu mythology and visit to this place should be adhered in that way.

Name: gayatriPune
Title: Chakratirth
Review: I visited Naimisharanya for Bhagavat katha. So 1st thing we visited Chakratirth. It  is very significant for those who believe in Bhagavat .

Name: vaida17
Title: very interesting
Review: visited on 19th morning.  very crowded.  very pious, but maintained very dirty.  the pandas are money freedy and fleecing the visitors, with all sorts of gimmicks and religious stories

Name: Manish178
Title: A place full of cheats
Review: It is said that Nemisharanya has been mentioned in the Vedic literature. I am not sure about the historical credibility of this place. But one thing that repulsed me was the crooks in the garb of priests loitering around and trying to extort money out of you. At a place of faith such acts so nothing but degrade the grace of the place itself, and that is what happened with me.

Name: satyaprakash375
Title: Nemisharan
Review: Nemisharan is situated in Sitapur, there are  many other temples like Hanuman Ghadi ,Dadhich Kund etc

Name: plpalani
Title: Sacred place with long tradition
Review: It is believed that Chakra teerth is created by the centre of the chakra created by Brahma' s heart it is believed to be the centre of earth. It is the God of earth.taking bath or sprinkling the holy water erases all sin.

Name: Shruti_Poki
Title: Holy Place!
Review: The place is known as neemsharanya also.It is a divine place and land of god.It’s believed that taking dip in holy water relives you from all sinsWe sat on the stairs leading to the pond.Just be careful as it’s very slippery the stairs near water and you may fall down in water getting injured.There are changing rooms available near the pond.It was a good experience to be at a place of such religious importance.

Name: Nipurn B
Title: Nice place of religious importance
Review: Chakra tirath temple is a very old religious place.it is said that the water in the chakra comes from base of the earth or patal lok as said well.There is a religious tradition to have a dip in water and take rounds( parikrama) around.Though the water I suppose is not at all clear as it seems very dirty still lot of people take a dip in water.the temple beside is small but good.Only point is that pandits sitting there will try to grab more and more money from youBy putting a amount donated against your name forcefully which you need to take care of and be cautious.

Name: manoj g
Title: Must see temple in Lucknow
Review: It is a very holy place for Hindus and a must see for all tourists. Most of the hindus visit this temple for Pinddan. This is a very old temple and has a special significance in our Hindu Mythology.

Name: raks125
Title: good
Review: it;s worth visiting this place. this has good good connectivity. one can offer puja to the the god with the help of pujari.

Name: guddu1954
Title: a holy place -must visit
Review: a very holy place for hindus.people go there for a number of reasons-the most important is Pinddan.nearby there are many places worth seeing.

Name: DotDivx
Title: Nice temple
Review: One should visit if a person has a spiritual inclination. It is a old temple and has a special significance in the Hindu mythology.

Name: rnraghavan
Title: Naimisaranya
Review: Chakra Tirth has a special siginificance in the Hindu mythology and the place gives that feel. A circular pond with temples all around it. Few other important shrines nearby like the Ahobila Mutt, Lalita Devi temple, Vyas Kund, etc.

Name: Pawan_Shrotria
Title: One of the Most Sacred Hindu Pilgrimage
Review: Chamra Teerth is about 70 kms from Lucknow and is one of the most sacred Hindu Pilgrimage.There is also a famous and 'Siddh' Hanuman Temple just about 1 kilometres far from chakra teerth. Do not forget to go there also.To my surprise the temple is Air-conditioned.

Name: MSaksham
Title: Nice
Review: Known as Naimisharanya ,is situated in Sitapur.You can go there,depends on your faith.But one thing you need to be aware of is ,that most people are thugs there.Even if you go inside a temple then panditji would stare you like anything and would ask you openly to donate at least 1000 INR(mostly).And also the time I visited there ,no hotel was available to get food to eat.Some dhaba kind only you can get with some selected range to choose food from.

Name: NanditGupta
Title: Temple at Sitapur
Review: Chakra Teerth also known as Neemsaar is situated in Sitapur near Mishrik There are many other temples like Hanuman Ghadi ,Dadhich Kund etc It's approx 100 kms from Lucknow

Name: MOHAMMED MOHSIN
Title: best experience
Review: Seen residency, kaisarbagh, aminabad, maulaviganj, nakkhas, malihwbad, hazratganj, drm office, passport office, reserve bank of India, fun republic mall gomti Nagar, alambagh, amausi airport, malihabad's mangos.

Name: swarnaprabha k
Title: positive  energy  and  positive  vibes  everywhere
Review: I  have  heard  many  a  times  about   Naimisar     in  mythological   stories   .    I  was  told  to  visit  that  place  during  our  Lucknow  visit   by  a  relative  .  so  we  travelled  the  distance  by  a  taxi  .  it  is  a  serene  place  ,  with  positive  energy  , positive  vibes  every  where  .  I    felt  the  Vibrations ,  received  through  chanting  of   about  80,000/-  sages like  Bysa  ,  Manu  many  many  years  ago . it  was  more  to  feel  than  to  see .the sacrad  places  incudes  the  Hridyalalita , Tripurasundari  temple , the  Byass  gaddi ,Hanuman  temple ,  beda  sangraha ,  suka muni  ,  parashara  muni  and  their  Tapasthali .

Name: Niket Kumar Dixit
Title: Must visit for vegetarians
Review: Great place to have snacks, sweets and dinner/lunch. Must visit, if you are around this place. Try Makkhan from this place definitely.

Name: chikpick
Title: Good for chaat and kulfi
Review: Buzzing with activity this place offers some mouth watering chole bhature and chaat. For some space and hygiene might be an issue but otherwise the taste is heavenly. Their kulfi is really tasty and worth to have a bite. Service is really fast.Though refrain from trying anything chinese.

Name: Ashok S
Title: Lunch
Review: Very tasty Punjabi food served with reasonably good ambience and reasonable  prices. Excellent spread of sweets.

Name: Pravesh Goswami
Title: Mediocre & Expensive
Review: Had my lunch there. food was just OK, nothing special. Prices are very high. Can be avoided. Royal Cafe serves much better food. Better to walk some 100 m from here & go to Royal Cafe..

Name: Garry
Title: Birthday party
Review: Good place to visit but only problem is that there no well trained waiter and cleanness are not good. Inside the moti Mahal very bad smell comes over around . Outer area was good to stand.

Name: Madhvendra pratap singh
Title: Complain
Review: Dear mohimahal group I have visited your hazrat ganj unit at 30 sep and paid 556 for food one transection failed but today 556 deduct from my account please check and refund this amount .

Name: Christopher B
Title: Yummy, Yummy and Yummy!
Review: Listen this restaurant is only for born, committed and passionate carnivores, who are North Indian non-vegetarian junkies! Think tandoori! Think Naan! Think Raan! Think Paneer!

Name: Harish
Title: Very good chinese
Review: Very nice chinese authentic starter like crispy baby corns and chilli chicken is too delicious.Very delicious main course too.

Name: Sanjeev T
Title: Good Food and comfortable seating
Review: Often travel to Lucknow for work.This is a nice place in Hazratganj for lunch and snacks.It has two (or more) floors went up to first floor for dinner.Food was served within respectable time and was fresh and tasty.(Was hungry also).Have a vegetable, roti and paratha.Did not like roti.They have sweet shop and counters for Rabadi, Jalebi etc.

Name: Mayank S
Title: Delicious desserts
Review: This place was highly recommended to us by the locals so we decided to give it a try. To begin with, it is conveniently located at hazratganj and extremely easy to find. My family decided to go with the desserts and we ordered a kulfi faluda which a pretty good, but for me the thing that stood out was the daulat ki chat or makhan malai which was to die for. It was so scrumptious that you just couldn't stop at one. Had a delightful experience

Name: Niraj K
Title: Good Food
Review: The food served here is of good quality. This place is situated in one of the posh market of Lucknow - Hazratganj. They also make good sweets and Namkeen.

Name: pria s
Title: Nice restaurant
Review: It is one of the oldest restaurant in the heart of Hazratgunj. It offers amazing variety of sweets, paan, chaat at reasonable rates. .One must try their chaats, sindhi golgappa, imarti rabri, kulfi falooda which is served in kulhad. Do plan a visit to this place when you are in Lucknow next time.

Name: Sunil Dixit
Title: Taste and quality like real Moti
Review: I enjoyed eating at Moti Mahal so many times  It's location is very good. Cleanliness is also better but behaviour of staff is not good. They always seem unwilling to accept card payment. But above all food quality is the best. Kulfi is the most liked item even by children too. Interior is also nice after renovation. Totally it is good experience at Moti Mahal.

Name: FANOUT
Title: imerti and rabri
Review: to keep it short....to be able to get fresh stuff on your plate be prepared to match you wits with that of unmotivated shop hands....

Name: Jeevan Shanbhag
Title: Very Nice Restaurant with Chaat items and Sweets
Review: Very nice Veg Restaurant with availability of all types of Chaats and Sweets. One must try Special Thaali, Malai Makhhan, Malai Paan, various types of Chaat.

Name: Priya
Title: Vegetarian restaurant
Review: It is a very good vegetarian restaurant at hazratganj lucknow. One can try here chole-bhature, kesar badam milk and rabdi imirti

Name: Sharil I
Title: Delicacy at reasonable pricing
Review: Quality at reasonable prices is what moti mahal is known for ages. When you step in the start of snacks give you the feeling of a warm and tasty welcome which surely ends in the same place with a tasty pan.

Name: ChetanHD
Title: An abode for a hungry vegetarian traveller in a new city
Review: The lunch, dinner chalis are excellent. The service is quick and good.The savouries that are cooked right at the entrance are mouth watering, can't have enough of it. The masala milk with it's cream and spices served in a mud ware is authentic too.

Name: sumit g
Title: great value for money
Review: one of the best chats and sweet shops you'd find. complete value for money and great choice. must visit

Name: Samanvya
Title: Great Veg place
Review: Right in the middle of Hazratganj, this restaurant is amongst the oldest in Lucknow. It is a pure veg place and at first sight one might confuse it with a sweets shop. But you have to try the food here. Almost everything is delicious. Especially try the Makkhan Mallai served during winters.

Name: Ananta M
Title: Mouth-watering delicious food!
Review: Moti Mahal is famous for its sweets and snacks, and it did nto disappoint! We had Khasta Kachori, Samosas, Raj Bhog, Gaja Halwa and Rabri... all were were xcellent!!

Name: milesnmeals
Title: Overrated
Review: I did not eat much except one Chatt just to compare. I found it overrated and over priced.But it is located in the main hzratganj market.

Name: Megha
Title: Fantasy food
Review: We have tried masala dosa, thali, idli, hot milk, dry fruit halwa, anjeer halwa, walnut halwa and trust me everything was awesome.

Name: Mital_Ashish
Title: best place for chaat in lucknow
Review: Lovely chaat - try the aloo tikki, dahi wada and chole bhatura - worth a visit. though not a high end but has a long history. best chaat in town

Name: Amit M
Title: This is not an attraction
Review: Moti Mahal is a sweet shop, when one is in Hazratganj, one can visit for snacks, lunch or dinner or simply shakes or Ice-cream. But this is not an attraction which has to be visited while in Lucknow. Wrong posting of a shop in attraction.

Name: Atul_kansal
Title: Nice
Review: The food was deliciousad as always great Indian dishes.Some of the item  was little spicy for some in our group but its a great taste.its a great place to sit with friends and eat.

Name: randhirt2017
Title: Old is gold
Review: Food is tasty,but sweets are so yummyyy,low cost,fast service,location is also good,reasonable rates,but i thing i was facing parking problem

Name: Apurva S
Title: Chatori gali
Review: Its been long for me to go there, but when ever i think about hazratganj. The first thing came my mind is moti mahal. From breakfast to dinner i can eat all day along, even to if my stomach is full😉. Some Special item from this shop Aaloo paratha , puri bhaji and samosa -jalebi. these are my favourite in breakfast. Aalo chatpani pani-puriEmarti-rabdiFaluda ice cream Stick kulfiGaajar ka halvaAnd all chat item are mouth watering. Still after eat all of these you have space in you stomach to eat more then you can try lunch or dinner from the restaurant.*bit crowded this place in evening. So may be you have struggle  to get you order, but..but..but after eating that its worth it.

Name: OnlyOin
Title: Lucknowi street food
Review: It is my final destination after shopping in Hazratganj. I like the varieties of the chaats they offer. They claim that they use mineral water for the Paani Puri & other things. Though in this area there are many other streets vendors who sell street foods and Kulfi I prefer this joint as they have proper sitting arrangements in their basement. Service staffs are good but little slow. Sweets are of average quality and over priced.

Name: mkeshav
Title: Nice place for street food
Review: Good place to have some spicy street food , kulfi faluda is a must have and their special spicy samosa is a delight for those who like spicy food .

Name: ClubAstra
Title: Over rated
Review: All those You Tube videos & on-line reviews swooning over this average sweet shop got us to add this one to our gastronomic journey. Disappointing to say the least. The sweets were just about average and the much talked about chaat & paani ke bataase were extremely disappointing, considering any street side vendor in Delhi would serve you much better chaat.

Name: ktbulchandani
Title: Nice place for snacks and sweets
Review: I visited this beautiful restaurent after long time. Enjoyed the visit with family and cousins. the sncks and sweets were really tasty. Kulfi with faluda was very delicious. I found the place woth visit and money.

Name: Adil Rashid
Title: lucknow kw kulfi
Review: best kulfi in lucknow is too tasty and amazing flavour so guys if u go lucknow plz visit in moti mahal

Name: Nikhil P
Title: Worth visiting for sweets and fast food
Review: A visit to moti mahal was nostalgic as I used to visit this place with my parents when we were settled in Lucknow before moving out to Delhi. It offers pure veg food and sweets specially gajar ka halwa is mouth watering.  It scores an ace on cleanliness part as well. The aaloo ki tikki was served piping hot which was a respite in the cold weather of Lucknow.

Name: Pradyumna M
Title: Yummy maza
Review: It was a good plan of mine to visit there and yes we enjoyed and had a great variety of things to eat and yes it was tasty and the things weren't very costly and neatness was another good sign of moti mahal. It perfectly deserve 5 stars.

Name: Rasheedur Rahman Shihab
Title: Amazing Sweets
Review: Amazing sweets and snacks are being enjoyed here. It also serves South Indian food. It tastes amazing.

Name: needs_travelalways
Title: Snacks And Sweets
Review: This place is on the main road in hazratganj near to shopping market, this place serves good and delicious chats a boon for chat lovers and also you will find lots of different verities of sweets for the people with sweet tooth and also you will get there different types of fresh and hot served halwa a delicacies of Lucknow a place for must visit..

Name: PD1059
Title: great food items for all times
Review: Breakfast, lunch or dinner/ Brunch anything you want you to get here all fresh as there are so many people coming to this shop

Name: HOMPRS
Title: Popular sweet shop with own restaurant
Review: Variety of sweets and stuffs here to try. They have their own restaurant on first floor. Nice and clean restaurant with courteous staff.

Name: shrads1112
Title: Good chats
Review: Moti Mahal is a nice chat/ sweet shop. We had the aloo tikki which I don't usually like, but here they make it very crisp. I will surely go for a second one in my 1 week stay here. Other things also looked very good here, which I hope to try int he coming days.

Name: Shweta S
Title: Glory lost
Review: They used to be my favourite shop for sweets, especially elaichi peda. When ever i would visit Lucknow or my in laws came they would bring this elaichi peda. But the last couple of times the standard has gone down. They are not fresh and they don't bother to put the crushed elaichi on top of the pedas any more like they used to do earlier. The elaichi on the top used to add color, texture and taste to peda. Sadly the quality is going down.

Name: Babu Yelamanchili
Title: Excellent Restaurant with Mouth watering delicacies
Review: No Wonder it is considered as one of the MUST Visit places in this old city of Lucknow, Hazrat Ganj. It has a great variety of Menu options, various famous sweets for which the restaurant is famous for several decades, we have tried a Plate Meal (THALI) and it was so delicious and FULL , we could not try many TO BUY items that we decided to have when we first entered the restaurant. We had to buy and take away for later eating.

Name: Jitendra S
Title: Gunjing at Hazaratgunj
Review: Visit to Moti Mahal is a nostalgic experience where where aloo tikki nad makhan malai are the unmatched combination and mouth watering delights

Name: Atulyan071
Title: Lot of sweets
Review: A perfect veg restaurant and also a perfect place to enjoy the best of the sweets. Also located in the same stretch are some of the best shopping of Lucknow

Name: Rajani B
Title: Pearl building
Review: Built in early 19th Century, this palatial building was constructed by Nawab Saadat Ali Khan. This is another Nawab era building lying on the bank of Gomti.  The building was constructed to let the royal family to watch animal fight sports which were held on the other side of Gomti.  The building was also a bird watching place.  There are restaurants where delicious sweets and chaats available here.

Name: JatinAmbani
Title: Heaven for sweet lovers
Review: Excellent khajuraho milk & kulfi, tasty snacks & reasonably prices delicacies, A MUST VISIT PLACE. You could hardly ask for more. Ada chikan shop for clothing is 2 minutes away. All branded cloth shopping is on the same street. Highly recommended.

Name: Nikhil Sethi
Title: The best desserts
Review: A perfect place to enjoy your after-dinner rendezvous for the sweet tooth.Kulfi, Imarti, Milk, halwa and the amazing dood mithai

Name: Aarav K
Title: Fantastic Mahal
Review: I have eaten variety of tasty food here. According to my experience, food quality is fantastic. Kulfi here is so fantastic.

Name: gaurav
Title: visited there several times
Review: a good place to enjoy tasty food.   kulfi faluda, chat, butter nan, rasmalai, imarti and several other foods to enjoy. this place is a must place to visit for enjoying good and tasty foods and a must place to visit for the vegetarians

Name: Mandira B
Title: Veg Restaurant
Review: At the heart of Hazratganj, great for a quick bite, waiters are polite and friendly. Food is fairly ok. Do try the chat and the kulfi

Name: Stupid E
Title: Great Restaurant
Review: Moti mahal is a pure vegetarian restaurant, if you are like vegetarian food then here is a definitely the time to go here. Falooda kulfi is very fame here and I like it very much. Falooda kulfi I have eaten many times here, I like food here too. The quality of each item is awesome.

Name: Susej B
Title: Light refreshments
Review: Just a good cheap place for evening go between meats and the attraction is more for Emarti with Rabdi & Kulfi with Phaluda. Now difficult to explain but the first combo is indian sweets and the second is an ice-cream.

Name: Mohit Gupta
Title: Nice place for north Indian cuisine
Review: The place is very much visible as it is on the main road, awesome join for chaat and other snacks, dinner and lunch is also very good, kulfi and other Indian dessert is main highlight

Name: greatsamar
Title: Very  nice
Review: Good food with lots of variation at affordable price and located at good place. Inside ambience is very good.

Name: BeingNomad
Title: Nothing Special about it!!
Review: Well i was at Hazratganj and tried this restaurant as this was highly recommended by some of my friends.What i Liked: Location as its in the hub of Hazratganj, variety of the menu offers something for allWhat i did not like: There were limited staff and it too way too much time to get the food that forced us to avoid few orders.

Name: Shalu S
Title: Stand outside, don't go inside
Review: Place is good to stand outside the shop and eat kulfi, chaat or imarti. Taste is good. The only problem is the uncleanliness of the restaurant. It smells bad if u plan to sit and eat there. Waiters are not well trained. Overall, stand outside and relish chaat and kulfi

Name: Varun A
Title: Must visit!
Review: The place is perfect to try the local delicacies with decent hygiene standards!Enjoy the pani puri, sweets, kulfi, chaat and many more.The place has both seating and standing arrangements.Cards are also accepted and is situated at the

Name: kamal_innovaa
Title: Kulfi Falooda
Review: One of its kind Kulfi with Faluda,has great and Delicious taste,love to eat .Also they have all kind of Sweets as well IMATATI.

Name: sun_abhay
Title: Good restaurant
Review: One of the oldest and reputed restaurants of Lucknow and known for its delicacies. All kind of food are available with great taste and decent prices. great place to eat with family and friends .

Name: Bhu104
Title: Kulfi Faluda!!
Review: As recommended by our local relatives, we tried out Kulfi  Faluda at Moti Mahal & found it to be delicious cool n tasty.

Name: Mohammad Maaz
Title: The best ever mithai shop
Review: I think that it is the best sweets shop Specially in winters when we have milk of Moti Mahal it is the best And in winters the kulfi is the awesome

Name: Dryogendranath M
Title: Visit to Moti Mahal Restaurant
Review: The place is very good for quality food at affordable prices. This is situated in the posh locality of Hazratganj in the heart of the City.

Name: Angsuman C
Title: Good Sweets
Review: One of my friend staying in Lucknow referred me Moti Mahal. The sweets and halwas are really tasty but the cost is a bit higher compared to the quality.

Name: ShomuKundu
Title: Chats n sweets
Review: Indulging street shop with variety of chats n sweet. Tried the jalebi rabri n khajoor dudh highly recommended.

Name: Rishabh J
Title: Nice Kulfi - a must visit for non localities
Review: The best kulfi ever. Try the best of Lucknow here. Try the Tikki and the basket chaat as well. The faluda here is also awesome. Try being there in the evenings post 8 pm to avoid the traffic

Name: sid54321
