Title: Above Average quality sweets but at very high rates.
Review: Shop is good centrally located in Hazaratganj, they prepare abive average quality (i mean Ok-Ok type little bellow the good mark) but prices are very high in comparison to other city sweet shops because they share a good brand value.

Name: krazikams
Title: Highly popular Snacks & Chaats place
Review: One of very popular chaats shop offering a taste of local Lucknowi flavor chaats and snacks along with lassi, jaledbi and sweets varieties. Malai makhan, kachoris, halwa is simply amazing. Do visit this place, if in Lucknow.

Name: 53shahidb
Title: Heavenly experience
Review: They have awesome mouth melting indian deserts... must try moong dal halwa , gajar ka halwa , the hot masala milk served in earthen glass... , imarti with Rabdi is awesome . Best time is to have in winters 😊The owner is very courteous. They have  loads of deserts which look very tempting . Do not give it a miss 👍

Name: Ronak S
Title: Famous chat place
Review: One of the best chat (local snacks) available here. The puchkas, basket chat are out of the world. Must try

Name: sachindedhia
Title: chaat and desert
Review: Nice place to have chaats and deserts, we had samosa chole which was awesome. and malai makkhan , desert awesome again

Name: SwathiVivek
Title: Amazing food
Review: We went to Moti Mahal for dinner and ordered Panner Maharaja. Wow! it was just awesome. The quality of food and the service to absolutely very good. Must visit. The apni puri is another hit of this place. The only thing is that you cant get your chat and fine dining on the same floor. You have to visit different floors to enjoy all the varieties that they serve.

Name: Ishaan R
Title: Awadhi Cuisine
Review: Get here to taste some tandoori and awadhi cuisine and if there's still some space left, try having the biryani. You won't regret it.

Name: WorldTraveller_Ajay
Title: Desserts!!!
Review: One of the favorite restaurant in Lucknow. The best place to have desserts specially faluda icecream.

Name: ansangam
Title: Best for chat at Lucknow
Review: simply reading a review would not enough,a place you must go and enjoy if you visit Lucknow.  Great taste.

Name: 268yusufn
Title: Sweet Hub
Review: One of the famous shop located in Hazratganj .A must try Rabri and Jalebi are my favorite. Its very hygiene .

Name: Mayank U
Title: Best place for chaat
Review: I usually don't eat chaat except this place and so can confidently say that their chaat is the best one will find in India. All their items of chat like tikki, golgappa, matar chaat (only in Lucknow), dahi bade are out of the world. Even their kulfi, jalebi, rabri are must try. I am not from Lucknow but do make sure that whenever i visit the city of nawabs I eat at moti mahal 2-3 times, From 6-7 years since have been eating here have found their quality consistent.

Name: sujatapant
Title: great food ,average otherwise
Review: the chaats ,tikkies,falooda kulfi are excellent.In the winters the halwas,esp the black carrot halwa is really stupendous .the place however needs a refurbish and better ambiance .

Name: Mahua-CCU
Title: One of the moti s to discover
Review: Had read rave reviews about this eatery. Checked it out myself at Hazratgunj during our Lucknow visit. The chaats were good - both paprichaat and dahibatasha. But wouldn't call them the best. The corn kebaabs were delicious! Who says veg kebabs are not mouthwatering? My husband had a masala mushroom which was yummy. Spicy crispy! Finally we ordered kulfifaluda. Our bad luck that the kulfi was more salty then sweet. Even though the shop changed it what followed was salty too. Some leaking mould! Eatery has nice decor upstairs and the AC worked fine.

Name: Nisha Sharma
Title: Amazing Kulfi Faluda and Chat
Review: The best thing about this place is that it is open till quite late in the night (around midnight) with amazing kulfi faluda and gol gappas to offer. since this is on the main road, there is great assessbility.

Name: pankaj7862010
Title: not as name
Review: Restaurant is at First Floor and ambience is just Ok. Place is well lit and sitting is still age old and not very Comfortable. What I like here is chaat, gajar ka halwa over all its nice

Name: Saurabh M
Title: an old shop for food
Review: Good quality food but very expensive for normal person.but style of lucknow you can get to see here

Name: Durgesh S
Title: Only for taste lovers
Review: If you are in Lucknow, especially in Hazratganj then you have to be here for taste of Awadh. Lots of tasty cuisines are waitin for you. Never forget to taste Emarti Rabri and Falooda.

Name: greatsamar
Title: Awsome place
Review: Very well located and open toll midnight. All kind of chaat and north indian food is available here.

Name: Dharmendra S
Title: Best sweet shop at Hazrat Ganj
Review: This place is very popular for its sweets and Kulfi. You can enjoy going there around 9 to 10 PM and You will like this place for fast food items. They provide quality foods and sweets.

Name: Nivesh A
Title: Good Food!!!
Review: Its a good restaurant.Food is tasty. Ambience is so so nothing like fine dining.Prices are not very high but not cheap either.

Name: Dev1972
Title: Hmmmm.... must visit for once
Review: The place is a little congested. But. the food is great. Service may be a little slow considering the number of tables to serve within the restricted space. But, experience the food over here at least for once. And you will not regret it.

Name: Sudhir S
Title: economical and good
Review: Fast food and chat is tasty and good.There is ample space to sit and eat.service is fast.Chat is prepared in front of you and you can choose your food

Name: m_nad1
Title: Best place for fast food
Review: In the heart of the city at Hazrat ganj is a good place for fast food and sweet. Good quality fast food including sweets like imarti with rabri.

Name: Aromatz
Title: OLD LUCKNOW FOOD
Review: Whenever I am back at home I try to visit hotels where I can get old taste of Lucknow's food in which I am in love forever.I have been here at Moti Mahal many times in the past and the experience with the food gets better with each visit. They have a very good staff which takes care of all the services . The food quality and quantity is also fantastic.

Name: Manvendra77
Title: Good Place
Review: Moto mahal restaurnt is nice place, situated in the middle of hazratganj, provides good food, but it little costly.

Name: P N M
Title: Very Good
Review: Moti Mahal Restaurent are the chain of Restaurent in the city. In Hazaratganj this is situated middle of the Ganj. Food quality is marvellous. Prices are maderate. Service is very good.

Name: Abhishek R
Title: Best for Kulfi
Review: This place is amazing for Kulfi, and yes i can not forget Rabri Imrati. Must go for everyone going in Hajratganj. price is very reasonable. In 15 Rs Only they will provide you imarati and rabri. Kulfi was of 100 rupees but it was like full lunch meal...

Name: Shubhi G
Title: Love the food
Review: My favorite are the choole bhature, imarti and gulab jamun. Beinga popular restaurant, in the heart of Lucknow, Moti Mahal has been one of my regular food spots to hog on with friends. Its one of the most visited food joints in town since years. Their south indian cuisine is unbeatable and the best part - its a pure veg restaurant!

Name: Mrunalini N
Title: Food Lovers Paradise
Review: I cant stop raving about this place and its food. Every dish we had was excellent and un-comparable. The chats were awesome as well. Since I was unwell during my trip, I was greatly dependent on the daal chawal here. It was lip smacking.The most interesting item at this place was the paav bhaji. Although a bit different from what we have in mumbai / pune, it nevertheless lived up to the City's culinary reputation. A different taste yet amazingly tasty.What more can I say, its a must visit for tasty veg food at very reasonable rates!

Name: lalitmishra1990
Title: very very good hotal but very costly
Review: very very good hotal but very costly very very good hotal but very costly very very good hotal but very costly very very good hotal but very costly very very good hotal but very costly very very good hotal but very costlyvery very good hotal but very costly

Name: pkgupta2003
Title: Chaat Point
Review: If you wish to have chaat and Kulfi at Lucknow Moti Mahal is the place. It also has a retaurant with variety of food and sweet shop. Park your car at Multilevel parking opposite. Must visit place

Name: Arpitgupta25
Title: Great family restro
Review: I always loved this place with family becauze of kulfi...  olways crowded place and really good taste of all things..

Name: joshi_rajneesh1
Title: best in lko foreever
Review: moti mahal is always the best in lko and there is no any answer of this teste because this restaurant is very hyginic and good service here

Name: Atif M
Title: good eating place
Review: very good place for eating,always crowded. popular with locals and tourists. needs more cleaning and maintenance.

Name: Deepikatandon
Title: Nice Place
Review: A family restaurant with a lot of variety of foods. This place serves good food at reasonable price. Falooda Kulfi is good.

Name: John Muriango
Title: Wonderful
Review: A historic Roman Catholic Church located at the heart of Lucknow, Hazrat Ganj. Highly encourage you to visit.

Name: Ian b
Title: interesting hour spent here
Review: my wifes grandfather married here.... but in the old cathedral. the staff were very helpful to us. Shame the old cathedral has gone

Name: durham05
Title: Peaceful
Review: Enjoyed sitting here enjoying the tranquility of this place. Very big inside and nicely maintained. Only open at around prayers times so 5.30pm on weekdays.

Name: abs0110
Title: Good
Review: Nice place to hangout with friends and family. Usually not allowed inside except for prayers and sunday masses.

Name: garhwaliya
Title: Positive ambience
Review: This place is not too big but this is having very much peaceful ambience which makes this place like heaven.

Name: Sandip Bosu
Title: Spending Christmas 2018
Review: It was really a great experience to visit the place on occasion of Christmas 2018. I visited this place with my family. The environment was so good that we wanted to stay a little bit more listening to the lovely christmas carols that the young people were singing. So many people were visiting the place but there were no pushing or hustle. Hats off to the people of Lucknow, and thanks to the police and administration for organizing such an event with so many people without any chaos.

Name: Aakash A
Title: Vey Old and Beautiful Church in Lucknow
Review: St. Joseph's Cathedral is one of the oldest and most beautiful. It is Hazratgunj main market. Try to visit during evening time.

Name: Robert G
Title: Pleasant church, very welcoming.
Review: We arrived here just after the Christmas Day morning service. The vicar was very welcoming and let us look around at the Mutiny era memorial plaques.

Name: Vishal S
Title: Near to Hazratganj main market
Review: I visited the place with my family on Christmas eve and it was beautifully decorated. Close proximity to Hazratgunj meant it attracted a lot of people during the Christmas vacation. I loved the ambiance and the decorations

Name: Sudhir S
Title: St. Joseph's Cathedral is a Place to visit
Review: Situated in the heart of Lucknow city in the posh Hazratgunj market.On chrismas eave it is beautifully decorated.It also house a school for Boys

Name: Vibhu S
Title: St. Joseph's Cathedral
Review: This main part of Lucknow which  is beautiful view at main road at Hazrat ganj but at time of christmas eve it really seem so lighting and decorating with full joyous.

Name: Rohit T
Title: One of the biggest Cathedral in Asia
Review: Built in early seventies, this cathedral is a landmark of Lucknow. Located in the main elite shopping area of Hazratganj, the Cathedral also houses a college upto class 12 with affiliation to ISC Board.The Cathedral is beautifully decorated during Christmas and Easter

Name: Chaitanya A
Title: Hazratganj
Review: This Cathedral is in the heart of the city with a large statue of lord christ.It is reamarkable to see this place on 25th Dec.

Name: sun_abhay
Title: The church
Review: Oldest church in lucknow , place or worship for Christians and a reputed school of the city. peaceful place and very cosy in summers

Name: sunitmathur1203
Title: Brilliant during Christmas
Review: One of the most beautiful churches in Northern India is the St Josephs Cathedral Lucknow.  Dominating the scene in Hazratganj one is struck by the spectacular architecture of this Church. The upper part of this magnificent building is in the shape of a crescent supported by a broad structure, and rising from this crescent is a tall column with a giant cross on top. The statue of Jesus Christ with open arms, which stands atop the entrance to the prayer hall on the first floor, that we reach through the broad stairway is very awe-inspiring and reverential. The original building was constructed by Rev Fr William Gleeson and consecrated in 1862 by Bishop Anastus Hartmann. St Joseph’s  Cathedral was put up by an international organization to replace the earlier church that stood here for 99 years till 1970. The prayer hall of St. Joseph Cathedral is very spacious with pews on either side for you to say prayers in silence and pay obeisance to the Almighty with due reverence and devotion. The walls of the prayer hall are covered with the paintings representing the events from the life of Jesus Christ. A must visit place, especially during Easter and Christmas.

Name: Rohit C
Title: Cristmas in Lucknow it is in Cathedral...
Review: It is the one of the most favorite place during Cristmas and new year in lucknow. it is situate in the heart of the city and honored with biggest statue of Jesus Christ in Asia

Name: hemantec1019
Title: VERY GOOD
Review: Nice place to see and such a enjoying place it was.In night the environment of this to see was amazing.

Name: vinitasaraf2015
Title: A Church
Review: Located at Hazratgunj its a very old church. In a very busy thoroughfare. Nohing spectacular could visit

Name: pinaki50
Title: The Lord beckons...
Review: Located almost halfway on Lucknow's famous market thoroughfare lies this famous church ( n school). As one stands before this large place of worship the statue of Lor Jesus welcoming everyone with open arms it evokes  a feeling similar to the largest statue ' Christ The Redeemer' in Brazil.

Name: VipinSaini
Title: Visited the Cathedral Church - Very Holy Place.
Review: Very Holy Place & Very Big Church, in centre of the City of Lucknow in Hazratganj. Very Busy & Crowd in Christmas Eve, but it also has its own Fun to Visit in Christmas Eve, just Beware of Stupid Boys, rest everything if Perfect.

Name: mirzasamir1970
Title: Nice old Cristian Church
Review: Very nice Christian Church, the best in lucknow. It was very spiritual, I had the opportunity to witness the Sunday service. Nice choir.

Name: Saurabh C
Title: A Great Place
Review: St.Joseph's cathedral is a great church with excellent architecture and is open for all.It's calmness makes it a perfect place to go and offer prayers and feel peace at heart.

Name: Dharmendra S
Title: Good place
Review: Nice place to see in hazratganj. Best time to visit is 25 December and new year. I recommend this place to all the visitors.

Name: Satyam S
Title: visited on christmas day
Review: i visited in this church on 25 december and the church atmosphere is very nice and peacefull and i enjoyed a lot there.

Name: Rakeshdeep
Title: must visit...
Review: awesome place .. reminds trip to Margao Goa Church...not like Goa but of course takes you back to you old memories ....

Name: uskhushi7
Title: church
Review: love place ,relaxing , peace loving ,calming place for christians but all can visit the beauty of the place

Name: Himanshu T
Title: Meeting Jesus
Review: One should surely visit this Cathedral in the heart of Hazratganj. It is very famous place for all the visitors visiting Lucknow.

Name: josehanks
Title: Chrismas Celebration
Review: This is the centre o' attraction for celebration o' christmas, programs & candle burnin' takes place here, filled with crowds.

Name: joshi_rajneesh1
Title: holy church in lko
Review: this holy church is very populer in lucknow and many of people go to church for pray and do thier workship

Name: Dr Amrita Dass
Title: AN ICONIC CATHEDRAL
Review: The St Joseph's Cathedral is centrally located in the bustling shopping area of Hazratganj and attracts people of  all faith. There is no entrance fee.  During Christmas week the beautifully decorated Cathedral along with the outdoor nativity scene attracts thousands of visitors to the extent that there is a traffic jam!  Many persons find the midnight mass on December 24th an uplifting experience.

Name: Atif M
Title: famous church
Review: its very famous church, big, grand building. in the heart of city. very popluar with locals. good for spiritual experience

Name: Rishabh K
Title: not a Christian but respect it...
Review: Nice design of the cathedral....you should visit here and I wish for your good luck.... i have gone there only for one time.

Name: Mithlesh1989
Title: Peaceful
Review: like other churches, this is also very peaceful and grand. the building is old and of british time. in looks good in evening.

Name: manoj k
Title: Just OK
Review: It can be Seen from the Road itself. Nothing is Very Special About it , it as good as others. Just OK to see the place

Name: vikrant s
Title: Good One !
Review: This place will take to in the memories of British colony & will let your eyes UP & up for its beautiful building from inside to outside ! worth exploring !!!!!!!

Name: liveAKHAND
Title: HOLY CHRIST
Review: This is a beautiful place in the heart of lucknow. Its a very calm place and best time to visit is in sundays.

Name: Sarker
Title: Christmas Celebs!
Review: Visited the Church on Christmas and was awestruck by the beauty of the idol of Jesus Christ. Its perfectly visible from outside as it is very large in size. Cultural programs are very nice on Christmas.

Name: ANSHU-0893
Title: nice place to worship
Review: its really a very beautiful place to visit specially on  christmas occasion as the real beauty of the church reflects on those 2-3 days....

Name: Aman A
Title: The Cathedral of Lucknow
Review: This famous Church is located in Hazratganj area of Lucknow. The Church has many visitors all round the year. On the eve of Christmas, the Church hosts a walk through of the life of Christ by putting pictures of the journey of Christ.All the holy ceremonies are being held post that.

Name: Sourabhgogna
Title: A peaceful place amidst crowded lanes
Review: I have visited this place early in the morning as well as late at night. This leaves you very peaceful and calms your mind. Whenever I get a chance, I make sure to just be there for couple of minutes.

Name: Gobindalal Mukhopadhyay
Title: CCD FUN MALL LUCKNOW
Review: Excellent place for a cup of coffee at Fun Mall Lucknow. Good environment and enjoyable experience. A must visit place at Lucknow

Name: kishangupta_21
Title: Usual shopping mall and enternitement center
Review: Mall is getting old and it is not being properly maintained. Washroom are broken. For clothes shopping there are many shops. Overall experience was just ok.Most annoying thing for food cafeteria where you have to get mall credit for ordering any food. In today's time when everyone has card and mobile for payment I don't understand why they need this.If you coming via own car ready to spend 15 min to 30 min just for entering in parking or leaving from parking on weekends and public holidays.

Name: Joyful Pawan - Energy Coach
Title: Many things under one roof
Review: Best shoping mall.. All branded items.. Gomti Nagar, LucknowShop and have fun..Search for my Non-profit NGO - MyEatingSchool for Dieting Nutrition and to Save the Earth..

Name: Narayanan
Title: Nice place to hangout
Review: Fun Mall caters to all audience and sections, shopping, food, movies, groceries, etc., It's like a one stop destination to entire family for an evening hangout along with buying what you want and eat what you like.

Name: durham05
Title: Good selection of shops
Review: Nice big mall with a good selection of shops. Food court also good but not enough seats for everyone who was there.

Name: Harsh V
Title: amazing place
Review: i visited many malls and shopping complex but fun is very good it is not so big then pheonix mall in lucknow but one think i so that they maintain the safety grill in all level so that small children can not fall down i visited the mall to see capitan marvel movie not so good but visit was awesome must visit

Name: Relax711750
Title: Supper
Review: I had been with my friends it was enjoy moment and it is a very good place to see and enjoy please go there and enjoy everywhere

Name: saurabh k
Title: Best mall in Gomatinagar
Review: Nice place to visit in holidays, for shopping but i think sahara ganj mall is bettet than this..... .

Name: Rasheedur Rahman Shihab
Title: Worth visiting
Review: One of the many average rated shopping malls of Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. Among the other malls of the city, this one is worth visiting.

Name: Hedonist_Surya
Title: One of the "Quality refined" mall.
Review: Perfect place for chill-out & its comparitively less crowded than other ones.One of the best thing to enjoy there is the FUN CINEMA.All of the famous clothing and accessory brands are availible here including some famous food stalls and restaurants.

Name: Adil Rashid
Title: lko fun
Review: fun republic in lko gomti nagar .. is too big mujhe sabse aacha yaha fun ka movies laga sound quality is good and many brand are available

Name: abhishek g
Title: Personal visit
Review: A good mall in the city. It has got all the facilities, showrooms, brands for picking up. Fun rides for the kids and other things for entertainment are there at the mall. A 5  mins drive is the Gomti river front. A gud watch in the evening.

Name: Sandeep V
Title: Nice mall
Review: The Fun Republic Mall is a shopping mall located in Gomti Nagar, Lucknow.Built-up area is more than 970,000 sq ft.It was built by Zee Group in the mid-2000s at a cost of Rs 800 million . It comprises retail outlets, cinema, food court, gaming zone and 60-room boutique hotel.It has parking for 550 cars and average footfall of 25,000-28,000 on weekdays and 37,000-40,000 on weekends.

Name: Rasheedur Rahman Shihab
Title: Nice place to visit
Review: Fun Republic is one of the very few malls in Lucknow and Uttar Pradesh. Overall it is beautiful. Have visited this mall couple of times.

Name: sun_abhay
Title: BEST SHOPPING MALL OF LUCKNOW
Review: GREAT PLACE TO SHOP FOR HUGE RANGE OF BRANDS, NICE FOOD COURT, CINEMA THEATER, Great place for shopping, huge range of leading brands, nice food court, gaming zone, cinema theatre, classy and comfortable , parking some times becomes crowded  . A place of fun for family shopping.

Name: YatriForever
Title: Decent place, good food.
Review: Definitely this is one of those malls in Lucknow which has better ambiance and is less crowded; other than the multiplex area. Perhaps, being at Gomti Nagar helps. The original design and the quality of construction speaks for itself, being a Zee creation. I liked the food court. Recommended place for visitors to Lucknow.

Name: Akmal Y
Title: Small mall with big brands
Review: Probably the best mall in lucknow with good brands, cinelplex and food court. Best mall in Lucknow and nice to spend time and shop.

Name: 268yusufn
Title: FULL OF FUN IN FUN MALL
Review: The mall is big with goos stores too . But its not in the main city of lucknow. Its has wave cinema too . Usually the crowd comes for watching the movies.

Name: Harpreet S
Title: Can shop for multi brqnds here
Review: The mall is quite spacious. It has numerous brands to shop from. Major brands like Tommy, Gant, CK, Blackberrys, Nike, Shoppers Stop, Max.....provide an opportunity to shop for almost everything. One has lot of variety to select from. Location of mall is also very convenient with ample parking space. Food joints inside the mall are not too many but can find few like Mcdonalds, CCD. Overall a good experience !!

Name: P N M
Title: Very Nice
Review: Fun republic mall is situated in Pause area of Gomati nagar .You can purchase high quality of all type of materials home products, etc. It has good food products , Cinema & other intertainment center

Name: kalpajeetbhattachary
Title: Overall this Mall is real fun
Review: Fun Republic Mall is really very nice mall & off course suited for shopaholics. Specially Shopper stop, one should avail  life membership (free)  & Enjoy shopping all over India. Meena bazaar max,Spencer's for groceries & many more big brands to make your shopping experience awesome.  Also the food court serves varieties, surely recommend. Here one can eat, shop, play games, watch movies & ample parking place. Overall this Mall is real fun.

Name: Vikas G
Title: Nice mall offering good shopping experience...... and
Review: Very nice mall suited for shopaholics...shopper stop Meena bazaar max....Spencer's for groceries....& many more big brands...to make your shopping experience awesome ...here you can eat shop.... play games.....watch movies ...ample parking space....all in all good mall ...

Name: PK Arora
Title: Elegant
Review: Very decent with best of brands for shopping also the food court serves varieties, surely recommend .

Name: MJB_SG
Title: Excellent Shopping place for Branded Items
Review: I enjoyed shopping at this mall, specially the Shoppers Stop and BlackBerry showroom.I strongly recommend to avail life membership (free) at shoppers stop and keep enjoying shopping all across India :).

Name: rockzzM77
Title: One of the best mall in Lucknow
Review: Fun republic one of the best mall in Lucknow, having multiplex, food court, lots of famous clothes brand.

Name: authorneelesh
Title: a good mall- like any other mall
Review: Situated at gomti nagar, it is like any other big city mall and offers all the best brands and eateries besides movie halls.Walk in for a quick meal to to while time away if you have free time  as we did as we had finished site seeing and had a few hours to kill before catching our train.

Name: Anurag243
Title: One for all
Review: The Mall is one of the best in the city... the cinema in the mall is also good to watch movies.. have lots of options for shopping lovers..

Name: Nish0901
Title: Big Mall in Gomti Nagar
Review: There are many branded stores in this mall such as Spencer's, shopper stop etc. Fun cinema is also there if you want to see a movie. On the top floor, there is a good food court where you can satisfy your taste buds. Good place to go with your family and friends.

Name: KRISHNA T
Title: Full of fun
Review: A big nice mall located in gomtinagar lucknow. You get a variety of stuff here through various branded stores like max, shopper's stop, spencer's and many others. Here's there a Mc donalds as well and a big food court offering multiple food options. Multiplex is spacious and comfortable. Good for shopping, eating, movie or an outing with family/friends. Dont forget to watch XD movie here.

Name: Ravindra S
Title: Good place to hangout
Review: This is one of the cool place to hang out in gomti nagar. Most of the brand showroom you can find here in this mall. It has one of the biggest Spencer's outlet to shop daily items. Most of students in nearby location visit this place because of McDonald. Movie watching is yet another good reason to visit this place with big audi's and big screen. It is recommended to visit this place.

Name: Gurumurthy Bhargava
Title: Mall of Lucknow
Review: Fun Republic Mall is one of the best and most sorted Mall of Lucknow.This mall is located in the most developed part of Gomti Nagar, well connected and easily accessible .This place caters from Grocery including Green grocery on one hand to the most fashionable ensemble on the other hand .Fun Cinemas is an another attraction on the top floor along with an equally good food court.On the whole a good mall to hang around for all ages.

Name: Aditgarg93
Title: Good mall
Review: Fun republic mall in gomti nagar is a good option to shop for all mid range offers a wide variety to fit for every one budject specially a decent budject / movie hall is good / overall very nice experience

Name: Manvendra77
Title: Visited for watching movie
Review: One of the best mall in lucknow, having lots of shop of many brands, food court, and multiplex. I visited here for watching movie.

Name: greatsamar
Title: Best mall in lucknow
Review: Great mall. Having almost all brands. Multiplex Is also too good. Cleanliness is at its best always. Parking space is very good.

Name: Explore664351
Title: Mall....with cheap price....good for every one...
Review: With great new stylish look and all new feature....this mall is good for couples,family persons...all others..

Name: sid54321
Title: Mall with good shopping options.
Review: Mall with good location and wide range of brands like Raymonds, max, spencers and Fun multiplex with four screens.

Name: Shubham Gupta
Title: AWEsome Mall
Review: a good place for shopping, hangout and also movie.Yes, You can shop here with wide range of brands , there are some restaurant where you can eat some food and also a movie hall

Name: allwork99
Title: If you wanna pass your time with a movie, eat out....closest place
Review: Good to get quick buys from the  supermarket  for example, I picked up a good raincoat at an economical price, as it was raining in between the stay and didn't carry one for the trip.It also has a nice chineese cuisine restaurant which serves good meals. There is a multiplex where one can catch a movie.

Name: Jai1976
Title: Captain America
Review: I saw Captain America at the movie hall. Also did good shopping with my family. It has almost all shops here.

Name: abhi9032
Title: Nice Mall in Lucknow
Review: This mall is located in heart of Gomti Nagar. For shopping there are variety of branded showrooms here.Food court is very large in area and offers various varieties of food.

Name: musafir_nonstop
Title: Decent place to spend sometime indoors in summers..
Review: Located at Gomtinagar, it is one of the biggest malls of lucknow.. visited this place last weekend with family.. its a nice place to shop and spend sometime with family.. it has a play area for kids also inside the malls as well as outside there are some rides and swings where the kids can enjoy.. food court is on the top floor whereas Mc Donalds is on the ground floor.. food court has various options available like KFC, Pizza Xpress, Nathus, Royal Awadh, Desserts, Naughty food, Mad about China and many more.. ordered stuff from naughty food n desserts and loved it.. naughty food has a variety of combo offers available and that too at a reasonable price.. and desserts too has a lot of beverages n ice creams.. would recommend.. for shopping there are a lot of options you can choose as per your requirement.. there is a 99 store on the ground floor which is good so do visit that also.. although the items are not of 99rs but still the offers are good enough..

Name: agarwalshubhangi
Title: Awesome
Review: A very nice mall in Lucknow to hangout and shop as it offers variety of branded shops. It is beautifully decorated on festivals. The Christmas decoration was mesmerising.

Name: Vijay Jotwani
Title: A great Mall
Review: The Fun Republic Mall is centrally located at Gomti Nagar, Lucknow. It is vibrant and has a cross section of shops to cater for all needs under one roof. We had a great experience at that place.

Name: iamrajsg
Title: one very good mall in Lucknow
Review: Located at a very reachable place.. just opposite Reserve Bank Of India..Good place for shopping of clothes. has various good quality brands store available.only parking space is less. which creates an issue sometime.

Name: greatsamar
Title: best mall in lucknow
Review: one of the best mall in lucknow Located in Gomti Nagar, many brands available. The food court is good. Enough parking space underground and Gantry is very good.

Name: Denin A
Title: Nice Aura around it
Review: This is more or less the best mall in Lucknow. Presence of many premium brands also make it a shoppers delight. Parking is a nightmare though especially on weekends. Best mall in Lucknow for late night movies.

Name: Mohsin A
Title: Average Mall
Review: Located in Gomti Nagar, many brands available. The food court is not very good. Enough parking space underground but not properly lit.

Name: Ehsan R
Title: Going downwards
Review: I have had great expectations when this mall was commissioned. Within its first few years, it seems it's going downwards in terms of maintenance. The parking area has become horribly dark and rundown. As far as shopping is concerned, shops don't have variety of selection. The food court doesn't serve authentic food.

Name: Rishiseengh
Title: Shaan-e-Gomti nagar
Review: Being one of the best mall of Lucknow, Fun republic stands high and proud on the main road in Gomti nagar.The mall provide ample space for parking and various take-away food joints.it could be a great place to spend your leisure time in shopping and gulping some tasty food.

Name: Gurpreet K
Title: Good one around Gomti Ngr
Review: A good option in/around Gomti Nagar. Options for kids, majority of the brands are available, parking space of offices around the place is used up so no issues

Name: raks125
Title: very nice
Review: the place is not very big but it's a place where one would love to  visit once. the place has one multiplex also and food court too. i like the food court a lot.

Name: Anand G
Title: Possibly the Best in Gomti Nagar
Review: The Mall is a typical one with shops mostly targeting high end customers. However, the layout and infrastructure is very attractive. The Children's section is top class. The Food Court at the top is average. The more than adequate parking space is a pleasant change.

Name: anuj729
Title: Malls are the next leisure destinations in Lucknow
Review: If you are visiting Lucknow then you can spend some quality time shopping around at Fun Republic Mall.All the major brands like Shoppers Stop,Tommy Hilfiger, Blackberry, Levis you name them and you get them.It's a huge mall with ample of parking place and ideally located in Gomti Nagar one of the posh localities of Lucknow.There are wide range of restaurants and coffee shops few of them like Moti Mahal, Cafe Coffee day KFC .There is a children's play area where small electronic swings and video games are there.A newly opened 5 D movie theatre is also there. So if you are willing to have a nice past time then must visit the mall cum multiplex.

Name: NIHALFROST
Title: Nice place for shopping
Review: Located at a decent place... Had almost everything in one place... Good place for shopping at one place if you want to beat the sun... Nice place in lucknow...

Name: Ravi7980
Title: A place for time pass
Review: They have shoppers stop on the ground floor where you can find good clothing. A good place to hang out. Food court is also good. But not better than saharaGanj's food court.

Name: kartik9670
Title: nice rooftop restaurant
Review: visited 2 years ago,* a nice and bit costly rooftop restaurant*Croma Digital storeoverall i mostly visit here for shopping purpose's,not for restaurant.

Name: GRVARCH
Title: Superb Architecture.
Review: This is a good attraction to see.This area has tight security and very clean.This is a work place of all govt. related issues of Uttar Pradesh State.Raj Bhavan is opposite to this, and also very nice to see.Worth visit.

Name: abs0110
Title: Historic
Review: One of the best buildings of Lucknow. You will need pass or some VIP to escort you inside. Overall a humbling experience.

Name: Pappu N
Title: very nice nice
Review: I saw Modi ji here when when when he he came out from Bhuvan very clean please please visit it here good for Rajniti thank you so much

Name: RAJENDRA884 PRASAD
Title: Brilliant view after sunset
Review: This building is an architectural marvel and it's beauty multiplies after sunset.  It is beautifully illuminated in different shades and colours.

Name: Niraj K
Title: Rare Architechture
Review: The central place from where the U.P. Government runs its functions. The Vidhan Sabha and Vidhan Parishad holds their meetings here.Entry is restricted throuh Passes only.

Title: Must visit in the evening
Review: If you are in Lucknow then dont miss it, the British architecture is superb ,whole building is made of stones.The evening lighting of this building is extraordinary, take snaps with your family, you will love to visit it again and again

Name: Amit M
Title: Colonial Architecture
Review: The Vidhan Sabha is situated in the heart of Lucknow city on the main road from Hazratganj to Charbagh Railway station.This is the most famous building of Lucknow and is used by Law Makers.Nice architecture.

Name: Rohit T
Title: Landmark of LUcknow
Review: The imposing Council House or Vidhan Bhawan is a centre of power of the state. Across the street is the statue of UP's first Chief Minister, Gobind Ballabh Pant. The Republic Day Parade passes in front of Vidhan Sabha every year. During Republic Day and Independence Day the building is decked up with glittering lights.

Name: kalpajeetbhattachary
Title: Vidhan Sabha Bhavan is the is the most beautiful building of Lucknow.
Review: Vidhan Sabha Bhavan is the is the most beautiful building of Lucknow. It is a Power-Centre of U.P., where all Ministers have their offices . This is a government building. The new parliament is opposite the old one. The architecture is really attractive. It is closely situated to Hazrat ganj area in Lucknow.

Name: ST_INDIA
Title: Good architecture
Review: Visited Lucknow with the family and we decided to see the vidhan Sabha council house. The architecture is really attractive.

Name: Rasheedur Rahman Shihab
Title: The Beauty of Lucknow
Review: Vidhan Sabha Bhavan is the Beauty of not only Lucknow, but of entire Uttar Pradesh. It is a Power-Centre of U.P., where all Ministers have their offices.

Name: Nikhil P
Title: Good for taking selfies and pics
Review: It is closely situated to Hazrat ganj area in Lucknow and is the official place for legistative discussions in UP. The building offers beautiful back ground for taking selfies.

Name: Vipul556
Title: Beautiful Piece of Architecture
Review: Very close to the HaZratganj market, this is a beautiful piece of architecture and is a massive building right in the heart of lucknow

Name: Sandeep V
Title: Nice
Review: Vidhan Bhawan (Hindi: विधान भवन) is located in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India. The state is one of the few in the country which has a bicameral legislature also called Vidhan Bhavan with two houses -the lower and the upper. The lower house is the Vidhan Sabhaor the State Legislative Assembly and the upper house is called the Vidhan Parishad or the State Legislative council. The Vidhan Sabha had 431 members till 1967, but now the Vidhan Sabha consists of 403 directly elected members and one nominated member from the Anglo-Indian community. The Vidhan Parishad has 100 members.

Name: Daniel
Title: Just pass by it, that will suffice
Review: This is a government building. The new parliament is opposite the old one. Just have you Cab/Auto guy stop there and inspect, not something you want to visit on purpose but you can't miss this when you are traveling to Hazratganj.

Name: gauravkhattar
Title: Good for a few clicks...
Review: UP vidhan sabha... commoners not allowed inside to stroll or click pics... so, from outside, it offers a nice backdrop for pics... and admire the old grandiose structure... thats it... Located in heart of city... Hazratganj...

Name: Rachit J
Title: architecture marvel
Review: due to metro construction one would now not be able to enjoy its unparalled view but its grandeur speaks for itself and lucknow

Name: Aarav K
Title: Vidhan Sabha bhavan
Review: Visited here one month ago, made of old and awesome Architecture. This is very beautiful place. You will also love to see.

Name: familytraveler987987
Title: Nice view
Review: we saw it from outside. nice architecture. Need to spend more time in the city to explore everything.

Name: 268yusufn
Title: PRIDE FEELING
Review: Me and my friends went on 14aug to see the flag hosting and the feeling was amazing . Number of people have come over to see the hosting and media all over.

Name: JITENDRA Singh
Title: beautifil
Review: sach a beautiful place for visiting but entry in not allowed the steet is wide nd the best in photography from outside

Title: Vidhan Shabha on Independence day

Name: sun_abhay

Review: The state assembly building  is a grand structure made of sandstone. It is an octagonal  shaped building with a domed roof.One cannot enter the building so one has to only enjoy the architecture from outside.

Name: Aditgarg93

It is a huge structure which will probably be the biggest residence anywhere in India.Being built by someone claiming to be a socialist it mocks the poverty of uttar pradesh.

Name: Anurag243

Name: Nivesh A
Title: Grand !!!

Name: Mohsin A
Title: Great architecture

Name: sid54321
Title: Building is an example of Lucknow's heritage architecture.
Review: Lucknow Vidhan sabha building is an example of Lucknow's heritage architecture. Very big and made during British India. Best time to see during weeks of Independence day /republic day when building is decorated for ongoing functions.

Name: Fahim_Khan_13

Name: Nipurn B

Name: nik_0107

Name: Helen H
Title: GOod

Name: lotusdiamond
Title: House of Democracy

Name: Anand2107
Title: Average

Name: manojINDIA
Title: Historic buliding
Review: It's old but impressive building. It's situated on busy road. It's not accessible for everyone, you need special permission to enter in its premises. You can have selfie in front of the building. While visiting this historic building see news paper if there is any agitation on that day. By mistake if go this place on the day when some agitation going on in front of this building you will stuck in heavy traffic jam.

Name: sumantra_travel
Title: Vidhan Sabha Bhawan, Council House, 19 Sep'15
Review: 19 September, 2015.The Vidhan Sabha Bhavan is an impressive structure built in theBritish era. This was our first stop when we landed up atLucknow, for a quick family weekend getaway. The Wife is alsointerested in history, so we went to have a look at thisimpressive structure, from the outside. The arched sandstonestructure with its huge dome stands out amidst the surroundings.there are some intricate carvings all around the structure. Thedomes somehow reminded me of the St James Cathedral in London,perhaps an indicator of its British colonial heritage, in thearchitectural style. The sandstone is well in line with thebuilding materials used for large structures in North India.

Name: Vipul556
Title: Looks good
Review: The architecture of the building is quite good and impressive and so it seems that is hasn't still received its due.. Lucknow has a rich history and this place is a testament of that glorious past

Name: manoj k
Title: Good place to see the Modern architect of Lucknow .
Review: Nice Building  it has its own attraction the beauty of the building can be seen from the main road itself. is Side Vidhan Mandal and Secretariat are there.

Name: Satish T

Name: ST_INDIA
Title: Very nice
Review: The architecture of the building is classical in nature. The place is quite crowded and is visible from the main road. The VIP movements are expected so traffic jams occur regurlarly.

Name: Aman A
Title: Vidhan Sabha of Lucknow
Review: If you are travelling from the railway station towards Hazratganj, you can spot this building on your right hand side. This building looks beautiful during Republic Day and Independence Day time for its covered with Tiranga lightings.

Name: Manish B
Title: Excellent Building
Review: Commonly called Vidhan  Sabha, in middle of the city. The building is beautiful to watch.  you can watch this from outside

Title: Great Colonial Architecture
